posts.title: Luogu P3959 [NOIP 2017] å®è—
posts.text: qwq è¿™æ•°æ®èŒƒå›´ï¼ŒçŠ¶å‹æ— ç–‘ï¼ˆï¼ˆï¼ˆ æœ€åé€‰çš„è¾¹ä¸€å®šæ˜¯ç»™å‡ºå›¾çš„ä¸€ä¸ªç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ï¼Œä½†ä¸ä¸€å®šæ˜¯æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¿˜æœ‰ç³»æ•° K ã€‚ å¯ä»¥å‘ç°ï¼ŒK å®é™…ä¸Šå°±æ˜¯èµ·ç‚¹åœ¨æ ‘çš„æ·±åº¦ã€‚è®¾ $f_{i, S}$ è¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬ i å±‚ï¼Œå·²ç»é€‰æ‹©ç‚¹é›†ä¸º S çš„æœ€å°å€¼ã€‚ $f_{i, S} = \min f_{i - 1, T} + a[T][S] * (i - 1)$ã€‚ a[][]æš´åŠ›é¢„å¤„ç†å‡ºæ¥å°±å¯ä»¥ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦ $\Theta(n2^n3^n)$ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ã€‚ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 13, M = 1 << 13;int n, m, a[M][M], dis[N][N], bin[N];long long f[N][M];signed main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof(dis)); memset(f, 0x3f, sizeof(f)); bin[0] = 1; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) bin[i] = (bin[i - 1] << 1); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { int x, y, z; scanf("%d%d%d", &x, &y, &z); dis[x][y] = dis[y][x] = std::min(z, dis[x][y]); } m = (1 << n); for (int S = 0; S < m; ++S) { for (int T = S; T; T = (T - 1) & S) { int delta = S ^ T; bool ok = true; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { if (!(delta & bin[i - 1])) continue; int mini = 0x3f3f3f3f; for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) if ((bin[j - 1] & T) == bin[j - 1]) mini = std::min(mini, dis[j][i]); if (mini == 0x3f3f3f3f) { ok = false; break; } a[T][S] += mini; } if (!ok) a[T][S] = 0x3f3f3f3f; } } for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) f[1][bin[i - 1]] = 0; for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) for (int S = 0; S < m; ++S) for (int T = S; T; T = (T - 1) & S) if (a[T][S] != 0x3f3f3f3f) f[i][S] = std::min(f[i][S], f[i - 1][T] + a[T][S] * (i - 1)); long long ans = 1ll << 62; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) ans = std::min(ans, f[i][m - 1]); return !printf("%lld\n", ans);}

posts.title: Luogu P5021 [NOIP 2018] èµ›é“ä¿®å»º
posts.text: qwq æˆ‘æ˜¯å…¨ç»„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå†™èµ›é“ä¿®å»ºçš„.jpg ç»™å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªæ— æ ¹æ ‘ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ˜¾ç„¶å¯ä»¥é’¦å®š 1 ä¸ºæ ¹ã€‚çœ‹åˆ°æœ€å°å€¼æœ€å¤§ï¼Œæ˜“äºæƒ³åˆ°äºŒåˆ†é•¿åº¦æœ€å°å€¼ limã€‚ ç°åœ¨ä¸»è¦é—®é¢˜åœ¨äº check å‡½æ•°ã€‚å¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ xï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå­æ ‘å¯ä»¥äº§ç”Ÿèµ›é“ $res = val + dis$ã€‚val æ˜¯ x ä¸å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è¾¹æƒï¼Œdis æ˜¯å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸Šä¼ çš„èµ›é“é•¿åº¦ã€‚ res æœ‰ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å†µï¼š $res \ge lim$ ç›´æ¥ ++cntï¼Œç¬¦åˆè¦æ±‚çš„èµ›é“æ•°å¢åŠ ã€‚ $res < lim$ è¿™ä¸ªèµ›é“å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä¸å…¶ä»–èµ›é“é…å¯¹çš„æ–¹å¼äº§ç”Ÿè´¡çŒ®ã€‚ è€ƒè™‘ç¬¬äºŒç§æƒ…å†µï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŠŠæ‰€æœ‰å°äº lim çš„èµ›é“å¡åˆ° multiset é‡Œï¼ˆå…è®¸é‡å¤ï¼‰ï¼Œæœ€åä¾æ¬¡ lowerbound æŸ¥æ‰¾ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä¸å®ƒç›¸åŠ å¤§äºç­‰äº lim çš„èµ›é“ï¼Œ++cntï¼Œå¹¶ä» multiset é‡Œåˆ å»ã€‚æœ€åæŠŠæ— æ³•é…å¯¹çš„æœ€å¤§çš„èµ›é“ä¸Šä¼ åˆ°çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚ äºŒåˆ†çš„å³è¾¹ç•Œæ˜¯æ ‘çš„ç›´å¾„ï¼Œæ˜¾ç„¶ä¸ä¼šæœ‰èµ›é“æ¯”ç›´å¾„æ›´é•¿ã€‚ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 2e5 + 233;int n, m, ecnt, d, cnt, head[N], dis[N];struct Edge { int to, nxt, val;} e[N << 1];std::multiset<int> s[N];inline void addEdge(int f, int to, int val) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f], val}, head[f] = ecnt;}inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}void getD(int x, int fa) { for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa) continue; getD(y, x); d = std::max(d, dis[x] + dis[y] + e[i].val); dis[x] = std::max(dis[x], dis[y] + e[i].val); }}int dfs(int x, int fa, int lim) { s[x].clear(); for (int i = head[x]; i; i = e[i].nxt) { int y = e[i].to, w = e[i].val; if (y == fa) continue; int res = dfs(y, x, lim) + w; if (res >= lim) ++cnt; else s[x].insert(res); } int mx = 0; while (!s[x].empty()) { if (s[x].size() == 1) return std::max(mx, *s[x].begin()); std::multiset<int>::iterator it; it = s[x].lower_bound(lim - *s[x].begin()); if (it == s[x].begin() && s[x].count(*it) == 1) ++it; if (it == s[x].end()) { mx = std::max(mx, *s[x].begin()); s[x].erase(s[x].begin()); } else { ++cnt; s[x].erase(it), s[x].erase(s[x].begin()); } } return mx;}bool check(int k) { cnt = 0, dfs(1, 0, k); return cnt >= m;}signed main() { n = read(), m = read(); for (int i = 1; i <= n - 1; ++i) { int x = read(), y = read(), z = read(); addEdge(x, y, z), addEdge(y, x, z); } getD(1, 0); int l = 1, r = d, mid, ans = 0; while (l <= r) { mid = (l + r) >> 1; if (check(mid)) l = mid + 1, ans = mid; else r = mid - 1; } return !printf("%d\n", ans);}

posts.title: Luogu P1312 [NOIP 2011] Mayanæ¸¸æˆ
posts.text:
qwq æ¿€ æƒ… æ¨¡ æ‹Ÿ ç« çƒ­ æ¥ è¢­ æ åœ° å¤§ å†² å‡» æ¨¡æ‹Ÿningå¹²å°±å®Œäº‹äº†ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆæŠ€æœ¯å«é‡ OOPèµ›é«˜ï¼ˆ #include <bits/stdc++.h>class Mayan {public: void qwq();private: void read(); void dfs(int step); bool check(); void print(); void drop(); bool sakuzyo(); void upload(int ver); void download(int ver); bool move(int x, int y, int d); void yukari(); void _DEBUG(); struct Move { int x, y, g; }; int lim; int mp[10][10]; int g2r[10][10][7]; int ans[7][7]; bool vis[10][10];};const bool debug = false;Mayan uuz;signed main() { uuz.qwq(); return 0;}void Mayan::read() { scanf("%d", &lim); for (int j = 1; j <= 5; ++j) { int x, i = 7; while (true) { scanf("%d", &x); if (x == 0) break; mp[i][j] = x; --i; } }}void Mayan::qwq() { read(); dfs(1); puts("-1");}void Mayan::dfs(int step) { if (step == lim + 1) { if (check()) print(); else return; } upload(step); for (int j = 1; j <= 5; ++j) { for (int i = 7; i >= 1; --i) { ans[step][1] = i, ans[step][2] = j; if (move(i, j, 1)) { if (debug) printf("
Step %d: (%d, %d) moves %d.
", step, i, j, 1); ans[step][3] = 1; yukari(); dfs(step + 1); download(step); } if (move(i, j, -1)) { if (debug) printf("
Step %d: (%d, %d) moves %d.
", step, i, j, -1); ans[step][3] = -1; yukari(); dfs(step + 1); download(step); } } }}bool Mayan::check() { for (int i = 1; i <= 7; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= 5; ++j) if (mp[i][j]) return false; return true;}void Mayan::print() { for (int i = 1; i <= lim; ++i) printf("%d %d %d
", ans[i][2] - 1, 7 - ans[i][1], ans[i][3]); exit(0);}void Mayan::drop() { for (int j = 1; j <= 5; ++j) for (int i = 6; i >= 1; --i) if (mp[i][j] && !mp[i + 1][j]) for (int k = i + 1; k <= 7 && !mp[k][j]; ++k) std::swap(mp[k][j], mp[k - 1][j]);}bool Mayan::sakuzyo() { memset(vis, 0, sizeof(vis)); for (int i = 1; i <= 7; ++i) { int quq = 0; for (int j = 1; j <= 5; ++j) { if (!mp[i][j]) continue; ++quq; if (j == 5 || mp[i][j] != mp[i][j + 1]) { if (quq >= 3) { for (int k = j - quq + 1; k <= j; ++k) vis[i][k] = true; } quq = 0; } } } for (int j = 1; j <= 5; ++j) { int quq = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= 7; ++i) { if (!mp[i][j]) continue; ++quq; if (i == 7 || mp[i][j] != mp[i + 1][j]) { if (quq >= 3) { for (int k = i - quq + 1; k <= i; ++k) vis[k][j] = true; } quq = 0; } } } bool xi = false; for (int i = 1; i <= 7; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= 5; ++j) if (vis[i][j]) mp[i][j] = 0, xi = true; return xi;}void Mayan::upload(int ver) { for (int i = 1; i <= 7; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= 5; ++j) g2r[i][j][ver] = mp[i][j];}void Mayan::download(int ver) { for (int i = 1; i <= 7; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= 5; ++j) mp[i][j] = g2r[i][j][ver];}bool Mayan::move(int x, int y, int d) { if (mp[x][y] == mp[x][y + d]) return false; if (!mp[x][y]) return false; if (y + d < 1 || y + d > 5) return false; if (mp[x][y + d] && d == -1) return false; std::swap(mp[x][y], mp[x][y + d]); return true;}void Mayan::yukari() { drop(); if (debug) _DEBUG(); while (sakuzyo()) { drop(); if (debug) _DEBUG(); }}void Mayan::_DEBUG() { for (int i = 1; i <= 7; ++i, puts("")) for (int j = 1; j <= 5; ++j) printf("%d ", mp[i][j]);}

posts.title: Luogu P1850 [NOIP 2016] æ¢æ•™å®¤
posts.text: qwq æŸ¿å­å…¶å®ä¸éš¾æ¨ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯åˆ†ç±»è®¨è®ºçœŸçš„å¾ˆé•¿ï¼ˆ è®¾è®¡çŠ¶æ€ï¼š$f_{i, j, 0 / 1}$ ä¸ºå‰ i å¤©ï¼Œæ¢äº† j æ¬¡ï¼Œè¿™æ¬¡æ¢ä¸æ¢çš„ $E_{min}$ã€‚ åˆ†ç±»è®¨è®ºã€‚ æœ¬æ¬¡ä¸æ¢ï¼š ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡æ²¡æ¢ï¼š$f_{i, j, 0} \leftarrow f_{i - 1, j, 0} + dis_{c_{i - 1}, c_i}$. ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡æ¢äº†ï¼š$f_{i, j, 0} \leftarrow f_{i - 1, j, 1} + k_{i - 1} dis_{d_{i - 1}, c_i} + (1 - k_{i - 1})dis_{c_{i - 1}, c_i}$ æœ¬æ¬¡æ¢äº†ï¼š ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡æ²¡æ¢ï¼š$f_{i, j, 1} \leftarrow f_{i - 1, j - 1, 0} + k_i dis_{c_{i - 1}, d_i} + (1 - k_i) dis_{c_{i - 1}, c_i}$. ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡æ¢äº†ï¼š$f_{i, j, 1} \leftarrow f_{i - 1, j - 1, 1} + k_{i - 1} k_{i} dis_{d_{i - 1}, d_i} + k_{i - 1} (1 - k_i) dis_{d_{i - 1}, c_i} + (1 - k_{i - 1}) k_i dis_{c_{i - 1}, d_i} + (1 - k_{i - 1}) (1 - k_i) dis_{c_{i - 1}, c_i}$. å¯¹äºæ¯ç§æƒ…å†µå– minã€‚ disæ•°ç»„ç›´æ¥Floydé¢„å¤„ç†ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼ˆ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, m, v, e;int c[3005], d[3005], dis[305][305];double k[3005], f[3005][3005][3], ans = 1145141919810.0;inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}signed main() { n = read(), m = read(), v = read(), e = read(); memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof(dis)); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) c[i] = read(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) d[i] = read(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) scanf("%lf", &k[i]); for (int i = 1; i <= v; ++i) dis[i][i] = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= e; ++i) { int a = read(), b = read(), w = read(); dis[a][b] = dis[b][a] = std::min(dis[a][b], w); } for (int k = 1; k <= v; ++k) for (int i = 1; i <= v; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= v; ++j) dis[i][j] = std::min(dis[i][j], dis[i][k] + dis[k][j]); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) for (int j = 0; j <= m; ++j) f[i][j][0] = f[i][j][1] = 1145141919810.0; f[1][0][0] = f[1][1][1] = 0; for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) { for (int j = 0; j <= m; ++j) { f[i][j][0] = std::min(f[i - 1][j][0] + dis[c[i - 1]][c[i]], f[i - 1][j][1] + k[i - 1] * dis[d[i - 1]][c[i]] + (1 - k[i - 1]) * dis[c[i - 1]][c[i]]); if (j) { f[i][j][1] = std::min( f[i - 1][j - 1][0] + k[i] * dis[c[i - 1]][d[i]] + (1 - k[i]) * dis[c[i - 1]][c[i]], f[i - 1][j - 1][1] + k[i - 1] * k[i] * dis[d[i - 1]][d[i]] + k[i - 1] * (1 - k[i]) * dis[d[i - 1]][c[i]] + (1 - k[i - 1]) * k[i] * dis[c[i - 1]][d[i]] + (1 - k[i - 1]) * (1 - k[i]) * dis[c[i - 1]][c[i]]); } } } for (int i = 0; i <= m; ++i) ans = std::min(ans, std::min(f[n][i][1], f[n][i][0])); return !printf("%.2lf\n", ans);}

posts.title: Luogu P1600 [NOIP2016] å¤©å¤©çˆ±è·‘æ­¥
posts.text: qwq é¦–å…ˆæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹äºæ ‘ä¸Šè·¯å¾„é—®é¢˜çš„å¾ˆé‡è¦æ€è·¯ï¼šæŠŠè·¯å¾„ (p, q) æ‹†æˆ (p, lca), (lca, q). æ¥ä¸‹æ¥è€ƒè™‘æ¯æ¡è·¯å¾„ (s, t) å¯¹äºä¸€ç‚¹xæ˜¯å¦‚ä½•äº§ç”Ÿè´¡çŒ®çš„ã€‚ ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å†µï¼Œs åœ¨ x å­æ ‘å†…ï¼Œt åœ¨ x å­æ ‘å†…ã€‚ å½“ s åœ¨ x å­æ ‘å†…ï¼Œéœ€æ»¡è¶³ $dep_s - dep_x = w_x$ã€‚ç§»é¡¹ï¼š$w_x + dep_x = dep_s$ã€‚ å½“ t åœ¨ x å­æ ‘å†…ï¼Œéœ€æ»¡è¶³ $dep_s + dep_x - 2dep_{lca} = w_x$ã€‚ç§»é¡¹ï¼š$w_x - dep_x = dep_s - 2dep_{lca}$ã€‚ ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´ï¼Œå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªå­æ ‘ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦çŸ¥é“æœ‰å¤šå°‘ç‚¹æ»¡è¶³ $w_x - dep_x = dep_s - 2dep_{lca}$ æˆ– $w_x + dep_x = dep_s$ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªå¯ä»¥æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹å¼€ä¸€é¢—åŠ¨æ€å¼€ç‚¹çº¿æ®µæ ‘æ¥ç»´æŠ¤ã€‚å¯¹äºæ¯æ¡è·¯å¾„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ç»´æŠ¤ $dep_s - 2dep_{lca}$ å’Œ $dep_s$ã€‚ å¯¹äºè·¯å¾„ (s, t)ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åˆ†åˆ«åœ¨ s å’Œ t çš„çº¿æ®µæ ‘ç»´æŠ¤ $dep_s$ ã€$dep_s - 2dep_{lca}$ï¼Œç”¨æ ‘ä¸Šå·®åˆ†çš„æ€æƒ³å¯¹ $LCA(s, t)$ å’Œ $fa_{LCA(s, t)}$ æ“ä½œã€‚æœ€ç»ˆä¸€é dfs å¾—åˆ°ç­”æ¡ˆã€‚ éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯æœ‰å¯èƒ½ $dep_s - 2dep_{lca} \le 0$ ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦æ•´ä½“åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªåç§»é‡ã€‚ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 3e5 + 233;int n, m, ecnt;int head[N], w[N], ans[N];int siz[N], dep[N], son[N], tp[N], fa[N];struct Edge { int to, nxt;} e[N << 1];inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}inline void addEdge(int f, int to) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f]}, head[f] = ecnt;}void dfs1(int x, int f) { dep[x] = dep[f] + 1, fa[x] = f, siz[x] = 1; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == f) continue; dfs1(y, x); siz[x] += siz[y]; if (siz[y] > siz[son[x]]) son[x] = y; }}void dfs2(int x, int tpp) { tp[x] = tpp; if (!son[x]) return; dfs2(son[x], tpp); for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa[x] || y == son[x]) continue; dfs2(y, y); }}int getLCA(int x, int y) { while (tp[x] != tp[y]) { if (dep[tp[x]] < dep[tp[y]]) std::swap(x, y); x = fa[tp[x]]; } return dep[x] < dep[y] ? x : y;}const int M = N * 300;int num, root[N], ls[M], rs[M], val[M];void merge(int &x, int y, int l, int r) { if (!y || (!x && !y)) return; if (!x) return (void) (x = y); if (l == r) val[x] += val[y]; else { int mid = (l + r) >> 1; merge(ls[x], ls[y], l, mid); merge(rs[x], rs[y], mid + 1, r); }}int query(int p, int l, int r, int x) { if (!p) return 0; if (l == r) return val[p]; int mid = (l + r) >> 1; if (x <= mid) return query(ls[p], l, mid, x); else return query(rs[p], mid + 1, r, x);}void modify(int &p, int l, int r, int x, int d) { if (!p) p = ++num; if (l == r) return (void)(val[p] += d); int mid = (l + r) >> 1; if (x <= mid) modify(ls[p], l, mid, x, d); else modify(rs[p], mid + 1, r, x, d);}void dfs(int x) { for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa[x]) continue; dfs(y); merge(root[x], root[y], 1, n << 1); } if (w[x] && dep[x] + w[x] <= n) ans[x] += query(root[x], 1, n << 1, n + dep[x] + w[x]); //ä¸åŠ ä¸Šè¿™ä¸ªif w[x]ä¸º0ä¼šè¢«åŠ ä¸¤é ans[x] += query(root[x], 1, n << 1, n + dep[x] - w[x]);}signed main() { n = read(), m = read(); for (int i = 1, x, y; i < n; ++i) { x = read(), y = read(); addEdge(x, y), addEdge(y, x); } dfs1(1, 0), dfs2(1, 1); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) w[i] = read(); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { int s = read(), t = read(), lca = getLCA(s, t); modify(root[s], 1, n << 1, n + dep[s], 1); modify(root[t], 1, n << 1, n + 2 * dep[lca] - dep[s], 1); modify(root[lca], 1, n << 1, n + dep[s], -1); modify(root[fa[lca]], 1, n << 1, n + 2 * dep[lca] - dep[s], -1); } dfs(1); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) printf("%d ", ans[i]); puts(""); return 0;}

posts.title: Luogu P2680 [NOIP2015] è¿è¾“è®¡åˆ’
posts.text: qwq ç»™å‡º m æ¡æ ‘ä¸Šè·¯å¾„ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åˆ é™¤ä¸€æ¡è¾¹ï¼Œæ±‚åˆ è¾¹åæœ€é•¿è·¯å¾„ã€‚ å¾ˆå®¹æ˜“æƒ³åˆ°äºŒåˆ†è·¯å¾„é•¿åº¦ï¼Œé‡ç‚¹åœ¨äºcheckå‡½æ•°ã€‚ æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå½“æˆ‘ä»¬æŠŠé•¿åº¦è¶…äºç»™å®šé•¿åº¦çš„è·¯å¾„çš„æŸæ¡è¾¹åˆ å»åæ‰€æœ‰è¾¹éƒ½å°äºç»™å®šé•¿åº¦ã€‚ æ˜¾ç„¶åˆ æ‰è¢«æ‰€æœ‰è·¯å¾„è¦†ç›–çš„é“è·¯æ˜¯æœ€ä¼˜çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿™ä¸ªå¯ä»¥ç”¨æ ‘ä¸Šå·®åˆ†çš„è¾¹å·®åˆ†åšã€‚ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 300005;int n, m, ecnt, mxdis, head[N], qwq[N];int dep[N], dis[N], siz[N], fa[N], tp[N], son[N];struct Edge { int to, nxt, val;} e[N << 1];struct Plan { int x, y, dis, lca;} plan[N];inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}inline void addEdge(int f, int to, int val) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f], val}, head[f] = ecnt;}void dfs1(int x, int f) { dep[x] = dep[f] + 1, fa[x] = f, siz[x] = 1; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == f) continue; dis[y] = dis[x] + e[i].val; dfs1(y, x); siz[x] += siz[y]; if (siz[y] > siz[son[x]]) son[x] = y; }}void dfs2(int x, int tpp) { tp[x] = tpp; if (!son[x]) return; dfs2(son[x], tpp); for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) if (y != fa[x] && y != son[x]) dfs2(y, y);}int getLCA(int x, int y) { while (tp[x] != tp[y]) { if (dep[tp[x]] < dep[tp[y]]) std::swap(x, y); x = fa[tp[x]]; } return dep[x] < dep[y] ? x : y;}void dfs(int x) { for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa[x]) continue; dfs(y); qwq[x] += qwq[y]; }}bool check(int lim) { memset(qwq, 0, sizeof(qwq)); int cnt = 0, mx = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { int x = plan[i].x, y = plan[i].y, dis = plan[i].dis, lca = plan[i].lca; if (dis > lim) { ++qwq[x], ++qwq[y], qwq[lca] -= 2; ++cnt; mx = std::max(mx, dis - lim); } } dfs(1); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { if (qwq[i] >= cnt && dis[i] - dis[fa[i]] >= mx) return true; } return false;}signed main() { n = read(), m = read(); for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i) { int x = read(), y = read(), t = read(); addEdge(x, y, t), addEdge(y, x, t); } dfs1(1, 0), dfs2(1, 1); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { int u = read(), v = read(), lca = getLCA(u, v); plan[i] = {u, v, dis[u] + dis[v] - 2 * dis[lca], lca}; mxdis = std::max(mxdis, plan[i].dis); } int l = 0, r = mxdis << 1, mid, ans; while (l <= r) { mid = (l + r) >> 1; if (check(mid)) ans = mid, r = mid - 1; else l = mid + 1; } return !printf("%d\n", ans);}

posts.text: T2æ€è·¯å¾ˆå¥½ T1T3ä¸¤ä¸ªæš´åŠ›ä¸è°ˆäº† T2å¥½é¢˜ æœ€å¼€å§‹è‚¯å®šæƒ³åˆ°çš„æ˜¯dfsæš´åŠ›ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦æ˜¯O(km)ï¼Œç¨³60åˆ†ã€‚ è¿™ç§åšæ³•çš„ç“¶é¢ˆåœ¨äºè¿é€šå—çš„åˆ¤å®šï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæœ‰æ²¡æœ‰ä¸€æ¬¾æ•°æ®ç»“æ„èƒ½å¤Ÿâ€¦ æœ‰å•Šï¼å†°èŒ¶å§¬å¯ä»¥ç»´æŠ¤è¿é€šæ€§ï¼Œè£†ç‡ƒå¯ä»¥ç»´æŠ¤è¿é€šå—è¾£ ä¸¤ç§å†°èŒ¶å§¬ï¼š$f_i$ è¡¨ç¤º 1 åˆ° i çš„ç‚¹çš„è¿é€šæ€§ï¼Œ$g_i$ è¡¨ç¤º i + 1 åˆ° m çš„ç‚¹çš„è¿é€šæ€§ï¼Œè¯¢é—®åŒºé—´ [L, R] æ—¶å°±æŠŠå†°èŒ¶å§¬ $f_{L-1}$ å’Œ $g_{R+1}$ åˆå¹¶èµ·æ¥ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯ O(n) çš„ï¼Œé¢„å¤„ç† O(mlogn)ï¼Œè¯¢é—® O(knlogn)ï¼Œæ€»å¤æ‚åº¦ O((m + kn)logn)ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ã€‚ æˆ‘è€ƒåœºä¸Šå±…ç„¶æ²¡å†™è·¯å¾„å‹ç¼©ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿå¤æ‚åº¦æˆäº† O((m + kn)n)ï¼Œæ­£å¥½æ— æ³•é€šè¿‡ï¼ŒGGã€‚ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, m, k, f[20005][505], g[20005][505], x[20005], y[20005], tmp[505];int getf(int x, int y) { return f[x][y] == y ? y : f[x][y] = getf(x, f[x][y]);}int getg(int x, int y) { return g[x][y] == y ? y : g[x][y] = getg(x, g[x][y]);}int tmpget(int x) { return tmp[x] == x ? x : tmp[x] = tmpget(tmp[x]); }signed main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) f[0][i] = g[m + 1][i] = i; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", x + i, y + i); memcpy(f[i], f[i - 1], sizeof(f[i])); int r1 = getf(i, x[i]), r2 = getf(i, y[i]); f[i][r2] = r1; } for (int i = m; i; --i) { memcpy(g[i], g[i + 1], sizeof(g[i])); int r1 = getg(i, x[i]), r2 = getg(i, y[i]); g[i][r2] = r1; } scanf("%d", &k); for (int i = 1, l, r; i <= k; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", &l, &r); memcpy(tmp, f[l - 1], sizeof(tmp)); for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) { int r1 = tmpget(j), r2 = getg(r + 1, j), r3 = tmpget(r2); if (r1 != r3) tmp[r3] = r1; } int ans = 0; for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) ans += (tmpget(tmp[j]) == j); printf("%d\n", ans); } return 0;}

posts.text: orz é«˜æ–¯æ¶ˆå…ƒæ¿å­ä¸ä¼šå†™åŠ›ï¼Œï¼Œï¼Œ ä»å®‡èˆˆé‚£é‡Œå«–äº†ä¸ªé«˜æ–¯çº¦æ—¦æ¶ˆå…ƒæ¿å­ï¼ŒæŠŠçŸ©é˜µå‰Šæˆå¯¹è§’çº¿çŸ©é˜µã€‚è¿™æ ·æ¯”æ™®é€šé«˜æ–¯æ¶ˆå…ƒè®¡ç®—é‡å¤§äº†ä¸€äº›ï¼Œä½†ä»£ç å¥½å†™ï¼ˆï¼ˆï¼ˆ è€Œä¸”é«˜æ–¯æ¶ˆå…ƒçš„å¤æ‚åº¦ä¹Ÿä¸å·®è¿™äº› å…³äºæœ¬é¢˜ï¼Œæ ¹æ®è·ç¦»åˆ—å‡ºä¸€å †äºŒæ¬¡æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼Œä¸å¯è§£ï¼Œä½†ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–¹ç¨‹å‡ä¸€ä¸‹å°±æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¡çš„äº†ã€‚æœ€åçš„å½¢å¼ï¼š $2(x_1-x_2)X + 2(y_1-y_2)Y + \cdots = (x_1^2-x_2^2) + (y_1^2 + y_2^2) + \cdots$ æ¶ˆå°±å®Œäº† 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132#include <bits/stdc++.h>const double eps = 1e-8;int n;double pos[15][15], a[15][15];void Gauss() { for (int i = 1, r = i; i <= n; ++i, r = i) { for (int j = i + 1; j <= n; ++j) if (fabs(a[j][i]) - fabs(a[r][i]) >= eps) r = j; if (r != i) std::swap(a[r], a[i]); for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) if (j != i) for (int k = n + 1; k >= i; --k) a[j][k] -= a[j][i] / a[i][i] * a[i][k]; }}signed main() { scanf("%d", &n); for (int i = 1; i <= n + 1; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) scanf("%lf", &pos[i][j]); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) { a[i][j] = (pos[i][j] - pos[i + 1][j]) * 2.0, a[i][n + 1] += pos[i][j] * pos[i][j] - pos[i + 1][j] * pos[i + 1][j]; } } Gauss(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) printf("%.3lf ", a[i][n + 1] / a[i][i]); puts(""); return 0;}

posts.text: æ ‘ä¸ŠèŒ¶ç²‰éš¾åƒ ä»Šå¤©å‡†å¤‡Rushäº†å¤©å¤©çˆ±è·‘æ­¥ï¼Œç»“æœå‘ç°æ ‘ä¸Šå·®åˆ†å¾ˆä¸ç†Ÿç»ƒï¼Œé‚æ€»ç»“ã€‚ æ ‘ä¸Šå·®åˆ†ä¸»è¦å¤„ç†æ ‘ä¸Šè·¯å¾„é—®é¢˜ã€‚åˆ†ä¸¤ç§ï¼šç‚¹å·®åˆ†ï¼Œè¾¹å·®åˆ†ã€‚ ç‚¹å·®åˆ†egï¼šç»™æ ‘ä¸Šä¸€æ¡è·¯å¾„ (p, q) ä¸Šæ‰€æœ‰ç‚¹åŠ ä¸€æƒå€¼xã€‚ åšæ³•ï¼šå·®åˆ†æ•°ç»„ä¸­ç»™ diff[p] += x, diff[q] += x, diff[lca] -= x, diff[fa[lca]] -= xï¼Œä¸€édfsã€‚ åŸç†ï¼šä¸€æ¡è·¯å¾„ (p, q) å¯ä»¥æ‹†æˆè·¯å¾„ (p, lca), (lca, q)ã€‚ç»™ä¸¤ç«¯ç‚¹å·®åˆ†æ•°ç»„åŠ è¿‡åå‘ä¸Šå›æº¯ï¼Œlcaå¤„ä¼šåŠ æˆ 2xï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥diff[lca] -= xã€‚è€Œ lca å›æº¯æ—¶åˆä¼šç»™ fa[lca] + xï¼Œfa[lca] å¹¶ä¸å±äº (p, q)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ diff[fa[lca]] -= xï¼Œå‰Šé™¤è¿™ä¸ªå½±å“ã€‚ è¾¹å·®åˆ†egï¼šç»™æ ‘ä¸Šä¸€æ¡è·¯å¾„ (p, q) ä¸Šæ‰€æœ‰è¾¹åŠ ä¸€æƒå€¼xã€‚ åšæ³•ï¼šè¾¹æƒä¸‹æ”¾åˆ°ç‚¹æƒï¼ŒæŠŠè¾¹æƒæ”¾åˆ°æ·±åº¦è¾ƒå¤§çš„ç‚¹ã€‚diff[p] += x, diff[q] += x, diff[lca] -= 2xã€‚ åŸç†ï¼šè¾¹å·®åˆ†æ¯”ç‚¹å·®åˆ†çš„å·®åˆ«åœ¨äº lca å¤„çš„å¤„ç†ã€‚ç”±äº lca ä¸Šæ²¡æœ‰è·¯å¾„çš„è¾¹æƒï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ diff[lca] -= 2xï¼Œç›´æ¥å‰Šé™¤å½±å“ï¼Œè€Œ diff[fa[lca]] ä¹Ÿå°±ä¸éœ€æ”¹å˜äº†ã€‚ ä¾‹é¢˜ï¼š$\textcolor{skyblue}{Easy}$ æœ€å¤§æµè¿™é“äº‹ç‚¹å·®åˆ†æ¿å­ï¼Œï¼Œï¼Œ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 5e5 + 233;int n, k, ecnt, ans, head[N], qwq[N];int siz[N], dep[N], fa[N], son[N], tp[N];struct Edge { int to, nxt;} e[N << 1];inline void addEdge(int f, int to) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f]}, head[f] = ecnt;}void dfs1(int x, int f) { dep[x] = dep[f] + 1, fa[x] = f, siz[x] = 1; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == f) continue; dfs1(y, x); siz[x] += siz[y]; if (siz[y] > siz[son[x]]) son[x] = y; }}void dfs2(int x, int tpp) { tp[x] = tpp; if (!son[x]) return; dfs2(son[x], tpp); for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa[x] || y == son[x]) continue; dfs2(y, y); }}int getLCA(int x, int y) { while (tp[x] != tp[y]) { if (dep[tp[x]] < dep[tp[y]]) std::swap(x, y); x = fa[tp[x]]; } return dep[x] <= dep[y] ? x : y;}void dfs(int x, int f) { for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == f) continue; dfs(y, x); qwq[x] += qwq[y]; } ans = std::max(ans, qwq[x]);}signed main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &k); for (int i = 1, x, y; i < n; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", &x, &y); addEdge(x, y), addEdge(y, x); } dfs1(1, 0), dfs2(1, 1); for (int i = 1, s, t; i <= k; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", &s, &t); int lca = getLCA(s, t); ++qwq[s], ++qwq[t], --qwq[lca], --qwq[fa[lca]]; } dfs(1, 0); return !printf("%d\n", ans);} $\textcolor{white}{Normal}$ æ¾é¼ çš„æ–°å®¶è¿˜æ˜¯ç‚¹å·®åˆ†ï¼Œä¸è¿‡è¦æ³¨æ„ç»ˆç‚¹æ˜¯ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªçš„èµ·ç‚¹ï¼Œä¼šè¢«ç®—ä¸¤éï¼Œè¦å‡æ‰ã€‚ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 300000 + 233;int n, ecnt, ans, a[N], head[N], qwq[N];int dep[N], siz[N], fa[N], tp[N], son[N];struct Edge { int to, nxt;} e[N << 1];inline void addEdge(int f, int to) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f]}, head[f] = ecnt;}void dfs1(int x, int f) { dep[x] = dep[f] + 1, fa[x] = f, siz[x] = 1; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == f) continue; dfs1(y, x); siz[x] += siz[y]; if (siz[y] > siz[son[x]]) son[x] = y; }}void dfs2(int x, int tpp) { tp[x] = tpp; if (!son[x]) return; dfs2(son[x], tpp); for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) if (y != fa[x] && y != son[x]) dfs2(y, y);}int getLCA(int x, int y) { while (tp[x] != tp[y]) { if (dep[tp[x]] < dep[tp[y]]) std::swap(x, y); x = fa[tp[x]]; } return dep[x] < dep[y] ? x : y;}void dfs(int x, int f) { for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == f) continue; dfs(y, x); qwq[x] += qwq[y]; }}signed main() { scanf("%d", &n); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) scanf("%d", a + i); for (int i = 1, x, y; i < n; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", &x, &y); addEdge(x, y), addEdge(y, x); } dfs1(1, 0), dfs2(1, 1); for (int i = 1, x, y, lca; i < n; ++i) { x = a[i], y = a[i + 1], lca = getLCA(x, y); ++qwq[x], ++qwq[y], --qwq[lca], --qwq[fa[lca]]; } dfs(1, 0); for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) --qwq[a[i]]; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) printf("%d\n", qwq[i]); return 0;} $\textcolor{orange}{Hard}$ è¿è¾“è®¡åˆ’æ­¤å¤„ $\textcolor{pink}{Lunatic}$ å¤©å¤©çˆ±è·‘æ­¥æ­¤å¤„

posts.title: hzoi-CSP-56
posts.text:
éƒ½æ˜¯å¥½é¢˜ T1: MerchantäºŒ åˆ† è¿™ç­”æ¡ˆæ²¡æœ‰å•è°ƒæ€§è¿˜æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆé¢˜ç­”æ¡ˆæœ‰å•è°ƒæ€§ é‡ç‚¹åœ¨checkï¼Œæˆ‘æœ€å¼€å§‹ç”¨å †å†™çš„ï¼Œä½†å¸¦äº†ä¸ªlogæ­£å¥½è¿‡ä¸å»ã€‚ åæ¥æˆ‘æƒ³èµ·æ¥äº†std::nth_elementï¼Œå®ƒæ˜¯O(n)çš„ä¹Ÿ~~~ ç„¶åæˆ‘æŒ‚äº†ã€‚å®ƒåªä¼šæŠŠå‰må¤§çš„æ”¾åˆ°å‰mä¸ªï¼Œå¹¶ä¸ä¼šæ’å¥½åºã€‚ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637#include <bits/stdc++.h>typedef long long LL;int n, m;LL s, k[1000005], b[1000005], f[1000005];inline LL read() { LL a = 0, b = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) b = c == '-' ? 1 : 0, c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return b ? -a : a;}bool check(int t) { LL tmp = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) f[i] = k[i] * t + b[i]; std::nth_element(f + 1, f + m, f + n + 1, std::greater<LL>()); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) if (f[i] > 0 && (tmp += f[i]) >= s) return true; return false;}signed main() { n = read(), m = read(), s = read(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) k[i] = read(), b[i] = read(); if (check(0)) return !printf("0
"); int l = 1, r = 1e9, mid, ans = -1; while (l <= r) { mid = (l + r) >> 1; if (check(mid)) ans = mid, r = mid - 1; else l = mid + 1; } return !printf("%d
", ans);} T2: Equationé¦–å…ˆå¯ä»¥é¡ºç€è¾¹æŠŠæ¯ä¸ªç‚¹çš„è§£ç”¨$k \plusmn x_1$è¡¨ç¤ºã€‚ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081#include <bits/stdc++.h>typedef long long LL;const int N = 3e6 + 233;int n, q, ecnt, num, head[N], dep[N], dfn[N], siz[N];LL w[N], val[N];struct Edge { int to, nxt;} e[N];struct Bit { int t[2][N]; void add(int op, int x, int d) { for (; x <= N; x += x & -x) t[op][x] += d; } int ask(int op, int x) { int ret = 0; for (; x; x -= x & -x) ret += t[op][x]; return ret; }} bit;inline int read() { int a = 0, b = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) b = c == '-' ? 1 : 0, c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return b ? -a : a;}void addEdge(int f, int to) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f]}, head[f] = ecnt;}void dfs(int x, int fa) { dep[x] = dep[fa] + 1, w[x] = val[x] - w[fa], dfn[x] = ++num, siz[x] = 1; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa) continue; dfs(y, x); siz[x] += siz[y]; }}signed main() { n = read(), q = read(); for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) { int x = read(); scanf("%lld", &val[i]); addEdge(x, i); } dfs(1, 0); while (q--) { int op = read(); if (op == 1) { int x = read(), y = read(); LL s; scanf("%lld", &s); LL tmp1 = bit.ask(dep[x] & 1, dfn[x]) + w[x]; LL tmp2 = bit.ask(dep[y] & 1, dfn[y]) + w[y]; if ((dep[x] & 1) ^ (dep[y] & 1)) { puts(tmp1 + tmp2 == s ? "inf" : "none"); } else { LL tmp = tmp1 + tmp2; if (dep[x] & 1) { if ((s - tmp) & 1ll) puts("none"); else printf("%lld
", ((s - tmp) >> 1ll)); } else { if ((tmp - s) & 1ll) puts("none"); else printf("%lld
", ((tmp - s) >> 1ll)); } } } else { int x = read(), v = read(), z = v - val[x]; bit.add(dep[x] & 1, dfn[x], z); bit.add(dep[x] & 1, dfn[x] + siz[x], -z); bit.add((dep[x] & 1) ^ 1, dfn[x], -z); bit.add((dep[x] & 1) ^ 1, dfn[x] + siz[x], z); val[x] = v; } } return 0;} T3: Rectangleé¦–å…ˆä»å·¦å¾€å³æšä¸¾çŸ©å½¢çš„å³è¾¹ç•Œï¼Œå†ä»å³å¾€å·¦æšä¸¾è¯¥å³è¾¹ç•Œçš„å·¦è¾¹ç•Œï¼Œ[L, R]ã€‚ é‚£ä¹ˆçŸ©å½¢ä»¬çš„é¢ç§¯å°±æ˜¯$(R - L) * \sum h$ã€‚é—®é¢˜åœ¨äºå¦‚ä½•å¿«é€Ÿç®—å‡º$\sum h$ã€‚ $h = y_{max} - y_{min}$ã€‚è€ƒè™‘ä»ä¸‹å¾€ä¸Šæšä¸¾$y_{max}$ï¼Œåœ¨å·¦ç«¯ç‚¹é‚£æ¡ç›´çº¿ä¸Šå­˜åœ¨æœ€å¤§çš„$y_{qaq} \le y_{max}$ï¼Œè€Œä¹‹å‰æ‰«è¿‡çš„ç›´çº¿ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰$y_i \in (y_{qaq}, y_{max})$éƒ½æ˜¯æœ‰è´¡çŒ®çš„ã€‚å°äºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå°äº$y_{qaq}$çš„é«˜åº¦$y_{min}$çš„ç‚¹éƒ½å¯ä»¥ä¸è¿™äº›$y_i$äº§ç”Ÿç¬¦åˆè¦æ±‚çš„çŸ©å½¢è¾¹é•¿ã€‚è®¾è¿™ç§ç‚¹æœ‰sä¸ªï¼Œåªè€ƒè™‘ä¸€ä¸ªyï¼Œå®ƒäº§ç”Ÿçš„è¾¹é•¿çš„å’Œå°±æ˜¯$s * y - \sum \limits_{y_i \le y_{min}} y_i$ã€‚ æŠŠæ‰€æœ‰ç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶çš„yäº§ç”Ÿçš„è¾¹é•¿ç´¯åŠ èµ·æ¥ï¼Œæœ€åæ¯ä¸ªå·¦è¾¹ç•Œäº§ç”Ÿçš„é¢ç§¯ä¸ºï¼š$\sum(R - L) (s_{y_i \le y_{min}çš„æ•°é‡} \sum \limits_{y_i \in (y_{qaq}, y_{max})} - \sum \limits_{y_i \le y_{min}} y_i * s_{y_i \in (y_{qaq}, y_{max})})$ã€‚$y_{max}$æ˜¯å‘ä¸Šæšä¸¾å¾—åˆ°çš„ã€‚ é•¿åº¦å’Œå’Œæ•°é‡å’Œéƒ½å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ ‘çŠ¶æ•°ç»„å¿«é€Ÿæ±‚å‡ºã€‚ ä¸å¼€LLä¼šè§ç¥–å®—çš„ã€‚ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int D = 1e9 + 7;int n, c[2510], pos[2510][2510];bool used[2510];struct Bit { int t[2510]; void add(int x, int d) { for (; x <= 2510; x += x & -x) t[x] += d; } int ask(int x) { int ret = 0; for (; x; x -= x & -x) ret += t[x]; return ret; } void clear() { for (int i = 1; i <= 2510; ++i) t[i] = 0; }} siz, len;inline int read() { int a = 0, b = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) b = c == '-' ? 1 : 0, c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return b ? -a : a;}void modify(int x) { if (!used[x]) { used[x] = true; siz.add(x, 1), len.add(x, x); }}signed main() { n = read(); for (int i = 1, x, y; i <= n; ++i) x = read(), y = read(), pos[x][++c[x]] = y; for (int i = 1; i <= 2500; ++i) std::sort(pos[i] + 1, pos[i] + 1 + c[i]), pos[i][c[i] + 1] = 2501; long long ans = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= 2500; ++i) { if (!c[i]) continue; siz.clear(), len.clear(); for (int j = 1; j <= 2500; ++j) used[j] = false; for (int j = 1; j <= c[i]; ++j) modify(pos[i][j]); for (int j = i - 1; j; --j) { if (!c[j]) continue; int p1 = 1, p2 = 1, cur = std::max(pos[i][1], pos[j][1]); for (int k = 1; k <= c[j]; ++k) modify(pos[j][k]); while (pos[i][p1 + 1] <= cur) ++p1; while (pos[j][p2 + 1] <= cur) ++p2; while (p1 <= c[i] && p2 <= c[j]) { int mn = std::min(pos[i][p1], pos[j][p2]); int trend = std::min(pos[i][p1 + 1], pos[j][p2 + 1]); (ans += (long long) (i - j) * ((long long) (len.ask(trend - 1) - len.ask(cur - 1)) * siz.ask(mn) - (long long) (siz.ask(trend - 1) - siz.ask(cur - 1)) * len.ask(mn))) %= D; cur = trend; if (pos[i][p1 + 1] <= cur) ++p1; if (pos[j][p2 + 1] <= cur) ++p2; } } } return !printf("%lld
", ans);}

posts.text:
æˆ‘å¥½èœï¼ŒAFOäº† è”èµ›é¢˜ä½ ğŸå‘¢ T1: è”ææ¸…æ¥štagçš„è¿ç®—è§„å¾‹å°±è¡Œäº† å¿˜å¼€long longç‚¸äº†60ptsï¼Œæˆ‘å“­å“­ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125126127128129130131132133134#include <bits/stdc++.h>#define int long longconst int N = 4e5 + 233;int m, qwq, qaq, askl[N], askr[N], askop[N], lsh[N << 2];struct SegTree { int l, r, tag, cnt;} t[N << 2];inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}void build(int p, int l, int r) { t[p].l = l, t[p].r = r, t[p].cnt = r - l + 1, t[p].tag = -1; if (l == r) return; int mid = (l + r) >> 1; build(p << 1, l, mid), build(p << 1 | 1, mid + 1, r);}void pushdown(int p) { if (t[p].tag == -1) return; if (t[p].tag == 1) { t[p << 1].tag = t[p << 1 | 1].tag = 1; t[p << 1].cnt = t[p << 1 | 1].cnt = 0; } else if (t[p].tag == 0) { t[p << 1].tag = t[p << 1 | 1].tag = 0; t[p << 1].cnt = t[p << 1].r - t[p << 1].l + 1; t[p << 1 | 1].cnt = t[p << 1 | 1].r - t[p << 1 | 1].l + 1; } else if (t[p].tag == 2) { if (t[p << 1].tag == 2) { t[p << 1].cnt = t[p << 1].r - t[p << 1].l + 1 - t[p << 1].cnt; t[p << 1].tag = -1; } else if (t[p << 1].tag == -1) { t[p << 1].tag = 2; t[p << 1].cnt = t[p << 1].r - t[p << 1].l + 1 - t[p << 1].cnt; } else if (t[p << 1].tag == 0) { t[p << 1].tag = 1; t[p << 1].cnt = 0; } else if (t[p << 1].tag == 1) { t[p << 1].tag = 0; t[p << 1].cnt = t[p << 1].r - t[p << 1].l + 1; } if (t[p << 1 | 1].tag == 2) { t[p << 1 | 1].cnt = t[p << 1 | 1].r - t[p << 1 | 1].l + 1 - t[p << 1 | 1].cnt; t[p << 1 | 1].tag = -1; } else if (t[p << 1 | 1].tag == -1) { t[p << 1 | 1].tag = 2; t[p << 1 | 1].cnt = t[p << 1 | 1].r - t[p << 1 | 1].l + 1 - t[p << 1 | 1].cnt; } else if (t[p << 1 | 1].tag == 0) { t[p << 1 | 1].tag = 1; t[p << 1 | 1].cnt = 0; } else if (t[p << 1 | 1].tag == 1) { t[p << 1 | 1].tag = 0; t[p << 1 | 1].cnt = t[p << 1 | 1].r - t[p << 1 | 1].l + 1; } } t[p].tag = -1;}void set(int p, int l, int r, int op) { if (t[p].l >= l && t[p].r <= r) { if (op == 1) { t[p].cnt = 0; t[p].tag = 1; } else { t[p].cnt = t[p].r - t[p].l + 1; t[p].tag = 0; } return; } pushdown(p); int mid = (t[p].l + t[p].r) >> 1; if (l <= mid) set(p << 1, l, r, op); if (r > mid) set(p << 1 | 1, l, r, op); t[p].cnt = t[p << 1].cnt + t[p << 1 | 1].cnt;}void flip(int p, int l, int r) { if (t[p].l >= l && t[p].r <= r) { if (t[p].tag == -1) { t[p].tag = 2; t[p].cnt = t[p].r - t[p].l + 1 - t[p].cnt; } else if (t[p].tag == 0) { t[p].tag = 1; t[p].cnt = 0; } else if (t[p].tag == 1) { t[p].tag = 0; t[p].cnt = t[p].r - t[p].l + 1; } else if (t[p].tag == 2) { t[p].tag = -1; t[p].cnt = t[p].r - t[p].l + 1 - t[p].cnt; } return; } pushdown(p); int mid = (t[p].l + t[p].r) >> 1; if (l <= mid) flip(p << 1, l, r); if (r > mid) flip(p << 1 | 1, l, r); t[p].cnt = t[p << 1].cnt + t[p << 1 | 1].cnt;}int query(int p) { if (t[p].l == t[p].r) return t[p].l; pushdown(p); if (t[p << 1].cnt) return query(p << 1); else return query(p << 1 | 1);}signed main() { m = read(); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { askop[i] = read(), askl[i] = read(), askr[i] = read(); lsh[++qaq] = askl[i], lsh[++qaq] = askr[i]; lsh[++qaq] = std::max(1ll, askl[i] - 1), lsh[++qaq] = askr[i] + 1; } lsh[++qaq] = 1; std::sort(lsh + 1, lsh + qaq + 1); qwq = std::unique(lsh + 1, lsh + qaq + 1) - lsh - 1; build(1, 1, qwq); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { askl[i] = std::lower_bound(lsh + 1, lsh + 1 + qwq, askl[i]) - lsh; askr[i] = std::lower_bound(lsh + 1, lsh + 1 + qwq, askr[i]) - lsh; if (askop[i] == 1 || askop[i] == 2) set(1, askl[i], askr[i], askop[i]); else flip(1, askl[i], askr[i]); printf("%lld
", lsh[query(1)]); } return 0;} T2: èµ›è€ƒåœºä¸Šæƒ³çš„å·²ç»å¾ˆæ¥è¿‘äº†ï¼Œä½†æˆ‘æ‰“é”™äº†ã€‚ è´ªå¿ƒï¼šæœ€å¥½é€‰ä»·æ ¼å°çš„ï¼ˆåºŸè¯ ä½†æ˜¯å¯èƒ½ä¼šæœ‰ä¸¤äººå–œæ¬¢ç›¸åŒçš„orzï¼Œè¿™éƒ¨åˆ†æšä¸¾ï¼Œå‰©ä¸‹çš„ç›´æ¥è´ªã€‚ æˆ‘å¼€äº†4ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ï¼šéƒ½å–œæ¬¢ï¼Œåªaï¼Œåªbï¼Œéƒ½ä¸å–œæ¬¢ã€‚ åœ¨è€ƒåœºä¸Šæˆ‘å»ºäº†4ä¸ªBITï¼Œè´ªå¿ƒé€‰ï¼Œç„¶åæŒ‚äº†ã€‚ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677#include <bits/stdc++.h>typedef long long LL;const int N = 4e5 + 233;int n, m, k, a, b;LL v[N], t0[N], t1[N], t2[N], t3[N], s1[N], s2[N];bool a_like[N], b_like[N];LL ans = (1ll << 62);inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}LL calc(int r) { LL tmp = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= r; ++i) tmp += t0[i]; int have = r, x1 = 1, x2 = 1, x3 = 1, rest = k - r; if (rest > 0) { if (t1[0] < rest || t2[0] < rest) return (1ll << 62); tmp += s1[rest] + s2[rest]; x1 += rest, x2 += rest; have += 2 * rest; } if (have > m) return (1ll << 62); while (have < m) { ++have; LL d1 = (1ll << 62), d2 = (1ll << 62), d3 = (1ll << 62); if (x1 <= t1[0]) d1 = t1[x1]; if (x2 <= t2[0]) d2 = t2[x2]; if (x3 <= t3[0]) d3 = t3[x3]; if (d1 <= d2 && d1 <= d3) { tmp += t1[x1++]; } else if (d2 <= d1 && d2 <= d3) { tmp += t2[x2++]; } else if (d3 <= d1 && d3 <= d2) { tmp += t3[x3++]; } } return tmp;}int main() { n = read(), m = read(), k = read(); if (k > m) return !printf("%d
", -1); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) v[i] = read(); a = read(); if (a < k) return !printf("%d
", -1); for (int i = 1; i <= a; ++i) a_like[read()] = true; b = read(); if (b < k) return !printf("%d
", -1); for (int i = 1; i <= b; ++i) b_like[read()] = true; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { if (a_like[i] && b_like[i]) t0[++t0[0]] = v[i]; else if (a_like[i]) t1[++t1[0]] = v[i]; else if (b_like[i]) t2[++t2[0]] = v[i]; else t3[++t3[0]] = v[i]; } std::sort(t0 + 1, t0 + 1 + t0[0]); std::sort(t1 + 1, t1 + 1 + t1[0]); std::sort(t2 + 1, t2 + 1 + t2[0]); std::sort(t3 + 1, t3 + 1 + t3[0]); for (int i = 1; i <= t1[0]; ++i) s1[i] = s1[i - 1] + t1[i]; for (int i = 1; i <= t2[0]; ++i) s2[i] = s2[i - 1] + t2[i]; for (int i = 0; i <= t0[0]; ++i) ans = std::min(ans, calc(i)); printf("%lld
", ans == (1ll << 62) ? -1 : ans); return 0;} T3: é¢˜1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, m, ans, u[500005], v[500005];bool qia[405];std::bitset<405> qwq[405];signed main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) scanf("%d%d", u + i, v + i); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { qwq[i][i] = 1; for (int j = m; j; --j) { int x = u[j], y = v[j]; if (qwq[i][x] && qwq[i][y]) { qia[i] = true; break; } qwq[i][x] = qwq[i][y] = qwq[i][x] | qwq[i][y]; } } for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { if (qia[i]) continue; for (int j = i + 1; j <= n; ++j) { if (qia[j]) continue; if ((qwq[i] & qwq[j]) == 0) ++ans; } } return !printf("%d
", ans);}

posts.text: æ·€ç²‰è´¨å¥½åƒ æ·€ç²‰è´¨äº‹é«˜ç«¯æš´åŠ›ã€‚å®ƒå¯ä»¥è§£å†³æ ‘ä¸Šè·¯å¾„é—®é¢˜ã€‚åˆ«çš„ç”¨é€”æˆ‘è¿˜æ²¡å‘ç°ã€‚ åŸç†å¾ˆç®€å•ï¼ŒæŠŠä¸€é¢—æ ‘åˆ†æˆå¾ˆå¤šå­æ ‘ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«ç®—å‡ºç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œå†æŠŠç­”æ¡ˆåˆå¹¶èµ·æ¥ã€‚ å¦‚æœå­æ ‘å¤§å°å·®è·éå¸¸æç«¯è‚¯å®šä¸å¥½ï¼Œå’Œæš´åŠ›æ²¡å•¥åŒºåˆ«ï¼Œé€‰åœ¨é‡å¿ƒæœ€å¥½ï¼ˆæ¯ä¸ªå­æ ‘çš„å¤§å°éƒ½ä¸è¶…è¿‡æ ‘å¤§å°çš„ä¸€åŠï¼‰ æ±‚ç­”æ¡ˆç”¨åˆ°äº†æ ‘å½¢èƒŒåŒ…çš„æ€æƒ³ï¼Œæ±‚å®Œä¸€æ£µå­æ ‘å°±æŠŠå®ƒå’Œä¹‹å‰çš„å­æ ‘è§†ä¸ºæ•´ä½“ã€‚ æ·€ç²‰è´¨å››æ­¥ï¼š 1.æ‰¾é‡å¿ƒ123456789101112void get_root(int x, int fa, int all) { siz[x] = 1; int mx = 0; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y != fa && !vis[y]) { get_root(y, x, all); siz[x] += siz[y], mx = std::max(mx, siz[y]); } } mx = std::max(mx, all - siz[x]); if (mx < maxson) maxson = mx, root = x;} 2. æ±‚è·ç¦»12345678void get_dis(int x, int fa, int sum) { if (sum > E) return; dis[++dis[0]] = sum; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa || vis[y]) continue; get_dis(y, x, sum + e[i].val); }} 3. ç®—ç­”æ¡ˆ123456789101112131415void calc(int x, int fa) { s.insert(0); for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa || vis[y]) continue; dis[0] = 0; get_dis(y, x, e[i].val); for (int j = 1; j <= dis[0]; ++j) { IT it = s.lower_bound(S - dis[j]); if (it != s.end() && (*it) + dis[j] <= E) ans = std::min(ans, *it + dis[j]); } for (int j = 1; j <= dis[0]; ++j) s.insert(dis[j]); } s.clear();} æ¯é“é¢˜çš„ç®—ç­”æ¡ˆä¸åŒï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯æ·€ç²‰è´¨åœ¨ä¸åŒé¢˜çš„å”¯ä¸€åŒºåˆ«ã€‚ è¿™é‡Œè´´çš„æ˜¯æˆ‘åœ¨9.28æ¨¡æ‹Ÿèµ›T3çš„ä»£ç ã€‚ 4.é€’å½’å‡½æ•°123456789void dfs(int x, int fa) { maxson = INF; get_root(x, 0, siz[x]); x = root, calc(x, fa), vis[x] = true; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa || vis[y]) continue; dfs(y, x); }}

ç‚¹åˆ†æ²»æƒ¨é­é—å¿˜ T1: aå°çƒæ”¾ç›’å­é—®é¢˜ï¼ˆ æœ‰æ—¶é—´æ€»ç»“ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼ˆå’•å’•å’•ï¼Ÿ ç›¸åŒå¼¹ç æ”¾ç›¸åŒç›’å­å¯ä»¥è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºæ•´æ•°åˆ’åˆ†ã€‚ è€ƒè™‘æ•´æ•°åˆ’åˆ†ã€‚f[i][j] è¡¨ç¤ºiä¸ªå¼¹ç æ”¾jä¸ªç›’å­çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ã€‚æ˜¾ç„¶æœ‰ä¸¤ç§è½¬ç§»ï¼šè¿™ä¸€æ•´å±‚éƒ½æ”¾ã€æœ‰ä¸æ”¾çš„ï¼Œï¼ˆé¡ºåºä¸å½±å“æ–¹æ¡ˆçš„ä¸åŒï¼‰ï¼Œæœ‰ä¸æ”¾çš„å±äºå­é—®é¢˜ã€‚ åˆ™æœ‰è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼š f[i][j] = f[i - j][j] + f[i][j - 1] (i >= j); f[i][j] = f[i][j - 1] (i < j). 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344#include <bits/stdc++.h>class Gekoo { public: void solve(); private: void main_input(); int _read(); int n, k; int f[5005][5005];};const int D = 998244353;Gekoo UUZ;int main() { UUZ.solve(); return 0;}int Gekoo::_read() { int a = 0, b = 1; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) b = c == '-' ? 0 : 1, c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return b ? a : -a;}void Gekoo::main_input() { n = _read(), k = _read(); }void Gekoo::solve() { main_input(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) f[i][1] = 1; for (int i = 1; i <= k; ++i) f[1][i] = f[0][i] = 1; for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) for (int j = 2; j <= k; ++j) if (i >= j) f[i][j] = (f[i - j][j] + f[i][j - 1]) % D; else f[i][j] = f[i][j - 1]; printf("%d
", f[n - k][k]);} T2: cæ•°è®ºé¢˜ä¸ä¼šè¯ï¼Œæ‰“è¡¨æ‰¾è§„å¾‹ï¼Œå‘ç°ç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶çš„æ•°å¯¹éƒ½æ»¡è¶³ä»¥ä¸‹æ€§è´¨ï¼š $(x, y) = x - y = x ^ y$. ä¸è¦é—®æˆ‘ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆï¼Œè¯æ˜æ‰¾dkyï¼ˆ é‚£å°±å¾ˆç®€å•äº†ï¼Œæšä¸¾$(x, y)$ï¼Œå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ª$(x, y)$æšä¸¾bï¼Œå®ƒå¿…ç„¶æ˜¯$(x, y)$çš„å€æ•°ã€‚$x - (x, y)$å¯ä»¥è¿˜åŸå‡ºä¸€ä¸ªyï¼Œ$(x, y) \oplus x$ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è¿˜åŸå‡ºä¸€ä¸ªyï¼Œå¯¹æ¯”å®ƒä»¬æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒã€‚ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243#include <bits/stdc++.h>class Gekoo { public: void solve(); private: void main_input(); int _read(); void get_list(); int n; int ans;};Gekoo UUZ;int main() { UUZ.solve(); return 0;}int Gekoo::_read() { int a = 0, b = 1; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) b = c == '-' ? 0 : 1, c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return b ? a : -a;}void Gekoo::main_input() { n = _read(); }void Gekoo::solve() { main_input(); for (int g = 1; g <= n; ++g) { for (int b = 2 * g; b <= n; b += g) { // g = b - a // g ^ b = a if ((g ^ b) == (b - g)) ++ans; } } printf("%d
", ans);} T3: bè€ƒåœºçœ‹å‡ºæ·€ç²‰è´¨ä½†æˆ‘å¿˜äº†ã€‚ è¿™æ˜¯æ·€ç²‰è´¨æ¿å­ï¼Œæ²¡å¾—è¯´ï¼Œç§»æ­¥æ·€ç²‰è´¨å¤ä¹ ï¼Œè¯·ã€‚ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 2e5 + 233, INF = (1 << 30);typedef std::set<int>::iterator IT;int n, S, E;int ecnt, head[N];int ans, root, maxson, siz[N], dis[N];bool vis[N];std::set<int> s;struct Edge { int to, nxt, val;} e[N << 1];inline void addEdge(int f, int to, int val) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f], val}, head[f] = ecnt;}void get_root(int x, int fa, int all) { siz[x] = 1; int mx = 0; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y != fa && !vis[y]) { get_root(y, x, all); siz[x] += siz[y], mx = std::max(mx, siz[y]); } } mx = std::max(mx, all - siz[x]); if (mx < maxson) maxson = mx, root = x;}void get_dis(int x, int fa, int sum) { if (sum > E) return; dis[++dis[0]] = sum; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa || vis[y]) continue; get_dis(y, x, sum + e[i].val); }}void calc(int x, int fa) { s.insert(0); for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa || vis[y]) continue; dis[0] = 0; get_dis(y, x, e[i].val); for (int j = 1; j <= dis[0]; ++j) { IT it = s.lower_bound(S - dis[j]); if (it != s.end() && (*it) + dis[j] <= E) ans = std::min(ans, *it + dis[j]); } for (int j = 1; j <= dis[0]; ++j) s.insert(dis[j]); } s.clear();}void dfs(int x, int fa) { maxson = INF; get_root(x, 0, siz[x]); x = root, calc(x, fa), vis[x] = true; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa || vis[y]) continue; dfs(y, x); }}signed main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &S, &E); for (int i = 1, x, y, z; i < n; ++i) { scanf("%d%d%d", &x, &y, &z); addEdge(x, y, z), addEdge(y, x, z); } ans = INF, siz[1] = n; dfs(1, 0); printf("%d
", ans == INF ? -1 : ans); return 0;}

æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç‹‚é­”ç¬¬ä¸‰å¼¹ è¿™é¢˜OOPç¡®å®å¥½å†™ä¸€ç‚¹ çˆ†å†™12KBï¼Œå†™ä»£ç 3hå·¦å³ï¼Œè°ƒè¯•2hå·¦å³ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ å…¶å®è¿˜æ˜¯æœ‰äº›ä¸è¶³çš„ï¼Œæœ‰äº›éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•çš„åœ°æ–¹ç›´æ¥ä¿®æ”¹äº†ï¼Œè€Œä¸”å˜é‡è¿˜æ˜¯æ”¾åœ¨privateé‡Œå¥½ä¸€äº›ã€‚ ä»£ç å¼€å¤´å†™äº†ç‚¹å¿ƒè·¯å†ç¨‹ åº”è¯¥ä¼šå†™çªéœ²è¯ºçš„å†°é›ªå°å±‹ï¼Œé‚£ä¸ªå†™å®Œå°±çœŸè¯¥é€€å½¹äº†ï¼ˆç¬‘  ver 1.0: ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡æäº¤ï¼ŒWA 0.// ver 2.0: ç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡æäº¤ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹äº†ç‰Œå †å †é¡¶æ²¡æœ‰ä» 1 å¼€å§‹çš„ bugï¼ŒWA 10.// ver 3.0: ç¬¬ä¸‰æ¬¡æäº¤ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹äº†å†³æ–—æ‰£è¡€å†™åäº†çš„bugï¼ŒWA 30.// ver 4.0: ç¬¬å››æ¬¡æäº¤ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹äº†æ— æ‡ˆå¯å‡»ä¼šåœ¨é¦–æ¬¡å¾ªç¯å°±é€€å‡ºï¼Œå¯¼è‡´æ— æ³•ä½¿ç”¨æ— æ‡ˆå¯å‡»çš„ Bugï¼ŒWA 55.// ver 5.0: ç¬¬äº”æ¬¡æäº¤ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹äº†åœ¨ä¸»å…¬è·èƒœåä»ç„¶è·å– bonus ç‰Œçš„ bug, WA 85.// ver 6.0: ç¬¬å…­æ¬¡æäº¤ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹äº†ä¿®æ”¹ç¬¬ 3 ä¸ª bug æ—¶äº§ç”Ÿçš„ bug. è°ƒç”¨æ‰£è¡€æ–¹æ³•æ—¶ç”¨é”™äº†å¯¹è±¡ï¼ŒAC.#include <bits/stdc++.h>#define IT std::vector<Card>::iteratorstruct Card { char kind; bool free;};class Input { public: void main_input(); void n_m_input(); void status_input(); void heap_input();};class Pig { public: Pig(); // æ–¹æ³• void start_round(); // å¼€å§‹æ–°å›åˆ void draw_card(); // æŠ½ç‰Œ void play_card(); // å‡ºç‰Œ void use_card(IT it); // ä½¿ç”¨å¡ç‰Œ bool find_card(char ch); // æ‰¾ç‰Œ void increase_HP(); // ç»­å‘½ void decrease_HP(); // è¢«ç»­ void hurt(Pig &that); // é€ æˆä¼¤å®³ void pith(Pig &that); // æ€æ­» void pithed(); // è¢«æ€æ­» void jump(); // è·³ bool to_be_dead(); // æ¿’æ­» void become_antilike(); // è¿›å…¥ç±»å void exit_antilike(); // é€€å‡ºç±»å bool accessible(char ch); // å¡ç‰Œå¯ç”¨æ€§ int find_kill(); // å¯»æ‰¾æ€çš„äºº void kill(Pig &that); // æ€ bool kill_respond(); // å›åº”æ€ int find_duel(); // å¯»æ‰¾å†³æ–—å¯¹è±¡ void duel(Pig &that); // å†³æ–— void south_attack(); // å—è›®å…¥ä¾µ bool south_attack_respond(); // å›åº”å—è›®å…¥ä¾µ void arrows_shot(); // ä¸‡ç®­é½å‘ bool arrows_shot_respond(); // å›åº”ä¸‡ç®­é½å‘ bool invulnerability(Pig &that); // æ— æ‡ˆå¯å‡» bool invulnerability_respond(); // å›åº”æ— æ‡ˆå¯å‡» void equip_crossbow(); // è£…å¤‡è¯¸è‘›è¿å¼© void unequip_crossbow(); // å¸ä¸‹è¯¸è‘›è¿å¼© // å˜é‡ std::vector<Card> hand; // æ‰‹ç‰Œ int array_index; // æ•°ç»„ä¸‹æ ‡ char status; // èº«ä»½ int HP; // ç”Ÿå‘½ bool dead; // æŒ‚äº† bool crossbow; // è£…å¤‡äº†è¯¸è‘›è¿å¼© bool kill_used; // å‡ºè¿‡æ€ bool antilike; // ç±»å bool jumped; // è·³äº†};int n, m; // å·¥ å…· äººint king; // ä¸»å…¬çš„ä¸‹æ ‡int anti; // åçŒªæ•°int heap_top = 1; // ç‰Œå †é¡¶char winner; // èƒœåˆ©è€…char heap[5005]; // ç‰Œå †bool gameover; // æ¸¸æˆç»“æŸInput in; // è¯»å…¥å¯¹è±¡Pig pig[15]; // çŒªç¾¤const bool debug = false; // è°ƒè¯•å…¥å£void print(); // è¾“å‡ºå‡½æ•°signed main() { in.main_input(); if (!anti) { winner = 'M'; print(); return 0; } pig[king].jump(); int pig_now = 0; while (1) { // ä¸»è¿›ç¨‹ pig_now = pig_now % n + 1; if (pig[pig_now].dead) continue; pig[pig_now].start_round(); if (gameover) { print(); return 0; } }}void print() { printf("%s
", winner == 'M' ? "MP" : "FP"); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { if (pig[i].dead) puts("DEAD"); else { for (IT it = pig[i].hand.begin(); it != pig[i].hand.end(); ++it) { if (it->free) printf("%c ", it->kind); } puts(""); } }}void Input::n_m_input() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); }void Input::status_input() { char sta[7], tmp; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { scanf("%s", sta); if (sta[0] == 'M') king = i; else if (sta[0] == 'F') ++anti; pig[i].array_index = i; pig[i].status = sta[0]; do { tmp = getchar(); if (isalpha(tmp)) pig[i].hand.push_back((Card){tmp, true}); } while (tmp != '
'); }}void Input::heap_input() { char tmp = getchar(); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { while (!isalpha(tmp)) tmp = getchar(); heap[i] = tmp, tmp = getchar(); }}void Input::main_input() { n_m_input(); status_input(); heap_input(); for (int i = m + 1; i <= 5000; ++i) heap[i] = heap[m];}Pig::Pig() { HP = 4; dead = false; crossbow = false; kill_used = false; antilike = false; jumped = false;}void Pig::draw_card() { hand.push_back((Card){heap[heap_top++], true}); }void Pig::increase_HP() { ++HP; }void Pig::decrease_HP() { --HP; }void Pig::equip_crossbow() { crossbow = true; }void Pig::unequip_crossbow() { crossbow = false; }void Pig::pithed() { dead = true; }void Pig::jump() { jumped = true; }void Pig::become_antilike() { antilike = true; }void Pig::exit_antilike() { antilike = false; }bool Pig::kill_respond() { return find_card('D'); }bool Pig::arrows_shot_respond() { return find_card('D'); }bool Pig::south_attack_respond() { return find_card('K'); }void Pig::start_round() { draw_card(), draw_card(); // æŠ½ä¸¤å¼ ç‰Œ if (debug) { printf("now its %d's round.
", this->array_index); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; printf("%d %c %d:", pig[i].array_index, pig[i].status, pig[i].HP); for (auto x : pig[i].hand) if (x.free) printf("%c ", x.kind); puts(""); } } play_card(); // å‡ºç‰Œ if (kill_used) kill_used = false;}void Pig::play_card() { bool flag = true; while (flag) { flag = false; for (IT it = hand.begin(); it != hand.end(); ++it) { if (it->free && accessible(it->kind)) { // å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ use_card(it); if (dead || gameover) return; flag = true; it = hand.begin() - 1; } } }}void Pig::use_card(IT it) { char kind = it->kind; int tmp; switch (kind) { case 'P': // æ¡ƒ if (debug) { printf("%d eats a peach!
", array_index); } it->free = false; increase_HP(); break; case 'K': // æ€ tmp = find_kill(); if (!tmp) return; if (debug) { printf("%d uses Kill. -> %d
", array_index, pig[tmp].array_index); } it->free = false; kill(pig[tmp]); break; case 'F': // å†³æ–— tmp = find_duel(); if (!tmp) return; if (debug) { printf("%d uses Duel. -> %d
", array_index, pig[tmp].array_index); } it->free = false; duel(pig[tmp]); break; case 'N': // å—è›®å…¥ä¾µ it->free = false; if (debug) { printf("%d uses South Attack.
", array_index); } south_attack(); break; case 'W': // ä¸‡ç®­é½å‘ it->free = false; if (debug) { printf("%d uses Arrows.
", array_index); } arrows_shot(); break; case 'Z': // è¯¸è‘›è¿å¼© it->free = false; if (debug) { printf("%d uses Crossbow.
", array_index); } equip_crossbow(); break; }}bool Pig::find_card(char ch) { for (IT it = hand.begin(); it != hand.end(); ++it) { if (it->kind == ch && it->free) { if (debug) { printf("%d uses %c
", array_index, it->kind); } it->free = false; return true; } } return false;}void Pig::hurt(Pig &that) { that.decrease_HP(); if (debug) { printf("%d hurts %d. left %d %d HP.
", array_index, that.array_index, that.array_index, that.HP); } if (!that.HP && that.to_be_dead()) { if (debug) { printf("%d killed %d.
", array_index, that.array_index); } this->pith(that); }}void Pig::pith(Pig &that) { that.pithed(); switch (that.status) { case 'M': winner = 'F'; gameover = true; break; case 'F': --anti; if (!anti) { winner = 'M'; gameover = true; return; } draw_card(), draw_card(), draw_card(); break; case 'Z': if (this->status == 'M') { for (IT it = this->hand.begin(); it != this->hand.end(); ++it) it->free = false; this->unequip_crossbow(); } break; }}bool Pig::to_be_dead() { for (IT it = hand.begin(); it != hand.end(); ++it) { if (it->kind == 'P' && it->free) { it->free = false; increase_HP(); return false; } } return true;}bool Pig::accessible(char ch) { switch (ch) { case 'P': if (HP < 4) return true; break; case 'K': if (find_kill()) return true; break; case 'F': if (find_duel()) return true; break; case 'N': return true; break; case 'W': return true; break; case 'Z': return true; break; } return false;}int Pig::find_kill() { if (kill_used && !crossbow) return 0; switch (status) { case 'M': for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (pig[i].antilike || (pig[i].status == 'F' && pig[i].jumped)) return i; else return 0; } break; case 'Z': for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (pig[i].status == 'F' && pig[i].jumped) return i; else return 0; } break; case 'F': for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (pig[i].status != 'F' && pig[i].jumped) return i; else return 0; } break; }}void Pig::kill(Pig &that) { jump(); exit_antilike(); kill_used = true; if (!that.kill_respond()) hurt(that);}int Pig::find_duel() { switch (status) { case 'M': for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (pig[i].antilike || (pig[i].status == 'F' && pig[i].jumped)) return i; } break; case 'Z': for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (pig[i].status == 'F' && pig[i].jumped) return i; } break; case 'F': return king; break; } return 0;}void Pig::duel(Pig &that) { jump(); if (status == 'F') exit_antilike(); if (invulnerability(that)) return; if (status == 'M' && that.status == 'Z') { hurt(that); return; } int tmp; while (1) { if (!that.find_card('K')) { tmp = 1; break; } if (!find_card('K')) { tmp = 2; break; } } if (tmp == 1) hurt(that); else that.hurt(*this);}void Pig::south_attack() { for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (debug) { printf("%d suffers a South Attack.
", pig[i].array_index); } if (invulnerability(pig[i])) continue; if (!pig[i].south_attack_respond()) { hurt(pig[i]); if (!jumped && pig[i].status == 'M') become_antilike(); if (gameover) return; } }}void Pig::arrows_shot() { for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (invulnerability(pig[i])) continue; if (debug) { printf("%d suffers a Arrow.
", pig[i].array_index); } if (!pig[i].arrows_shot_respond()) { hurt(pig[i]); if (!jumped && pig[i].status == 'M') become_antilike(); if (gameover) return; } }}bool Pig::invulnerability(Pig &that) { if (!that.jumped) { return false; } bool firstloop = true; for (int i = array_index; i != array_index || firstloop; i = i % n + 1) { firstloop = false; if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (pig[i].status == 'M' && that.status == 'F') continue; if (pig[i].status == 'Z' && that.status == 'F') continue; if (pig[i].status == 'F' && that.status == 'M') continue; if (pig[i].status == 'F' && that.status == 'Z') continue; if (pig[i].find_card('J')) { pig[i].jump(); return !pig[i].invulnerability_respond(); } } return false;}bool Pig::invulnerability_respond() { for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (status == 'M' && pig[i].status == 'Z') continue; if (status == 'Z' && pig[i].status == 'M') continue; if (status == 'Z' && pig[i].status == 'Z') continue; if (status == 'F' && pig[i].status == 'F') continue; if (pig[i].find_card('J')) { pig[i].jump(); return !pig[i].invulnerability_respond(); } } return false;}

posts.text: æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç‹‚é­”ç¬¬äºŒå¼¹ å…¶å®è¿™é¢˜ä¸éš¾ï¼Œä¸è¦è¢«è“è‰²tagå’Œè¯»å…¥å”¬ä½äº†ï¼Œç”¨ä¸Šstd::stringç›´æ¥ç§’äº†ã€‚ æšä¸¾æ˜ŸæœŸå‡ å’ŒçŠ¯ç½ªå«Œç–‘äººï¼Œåœ¨æ¯ä¸€å¤©åˆ¤æ–­æŸäººè¯´çš„æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯çœŸè¯ï¼Œå¼€ä¸ªfakeæ•°ç»„è®°ä¸€ä¸‹å°±è¡Œäº†ã€‚ å®åè°´è´£è¯»å…¥æœ€åæœ‰\rçš„å±‘æ•°æ®ã€‚ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, m, p, f[1003], error, fake[1003], cri;std::string name[1003], speaker, evid[1003];std::string qwq[10] = {"Tony Ma", "Today is Sunday.", "Today is Monday.", "Today is Tuesday.", "Today is Wednesday.", "Today is Thursday.", "Today is Friday.", "Today is Saturday.",};void judge(int x, int reality) { if (fake[x] && reality != fake[x]) error = 1; else fake[x] = reality;}signed main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &m, &n, &p); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) std::cin >> name[i]; for (int i = 1; i <= p; ++i) { std::cin >> speaker; speaker.erase(speaker.end() - 1); for (int j = 1; j <= m; ++j) if (speaker == name[j]) f[i] = j; getline(std::cin, evid[i]); evid[i].erase(evid[i].begin()); evid[i].erase(evid[i].end() - 1); } for (int day = 1; day <= 7; ++day) { for (int crime = 1; crime <= m; ++crime) { error = 0; memset(fake, 0, sizeof fake); for (int i = 1; i <= p; ++i) { int from = f[i]; if (evid[i] == "I am guilty.") { judge(from, crime == from ? 2 : 1); } else if (evid[i] == "I am not guilty.") { judge(from, crime != from ? 2 : 1); } for (int j = 1; j <= 7; ++j) if (qwq[j] == evid[i]) judge(from, j == day ? 2 : 1); for (int j = 1; j <= m; ++j) { if (j == from) continue; if (evid[i] == name[j] + " is guilty.") judge(from, crime == j ? 2 : 1); if (evid[i] == name[j] + " is not guilty.") judge(from, crime != j ? 2 : 1); } } if (error) continue; int lie = 0, truth = 0, idk = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { if (fake[i] == 2) ++truth; else if (fake[i] == 1) ++lie; else ++idk; } if (lie <= n && lie + idk >= n) { if (cri) { if (cri != crime) { return !printf("Cannot Determine\n"); } } else cri = crime; } } } if (cri) std::cout << name[cri] << "\n"; else puts("Impossible"); return 0;}

c[i].airport[4].second = c[i].airport[1].second + c[i].airport[2].second - c[i].airport[3].second; } std::cin >> c[i].t; } for (int i = 1; i <= s; i++) for (int j = i + 1; j <= s; j++) for (int x = 1; x <= 4; x++) for (int y = 1; y <= 4; y++) AddEdge(i * 10 + x, j * 10 + y, t * distance(c[i].airport[x], c[j].airport[y])); for (int i = 1; i <= s; i++) { AddEdge(i * 10 + 1, i * 10 + 2, c[i].t * distance(c[i].airport[1], c[i].airport[2])); AddEdge(i * 10 + 2, i * 10 + 3, c[i].t * distance(c[i].airport[2], c[i].airport[3])); AddEdge(i * 10 + 3, i * 10 + 4, c[i].t * distance(c[i].airport[3], c[i].airport[4])); AddEdge(i * 10 + 4, i * 10 + 1, c[i].t * distance(c[i].airport[4], c[i].airport[1])); k++) { if (k % 10 == 5) k = 10 * (k / 10 + 1) + 1; for (int i = 11; i <= 10 * s + 4; i++) { if (i % 10 == 5) i = 10 * (i / 10 + 1) + 1; for (int j = 11; j <= 10 * s + 4; j++) { if (j % 10 == 5) j = 10 * (j / 10 + 1) + 1; if (f[i][k] + f[k][j] != 0) f[i][j] = std::min(f[i][k] + f[k][j], f[i][j]); } } } double ans = 23333333; for (int i = 1; i <= 4; i++) for (int j = 1; j <= 4; j++) ans = std::min(ans, f[a * 10 + i][b * 10 + j]); printf("%.1lf\n", ans); memset(f, 0, sizeof(f)); memset(c, 0, sizeof(c)); } return 0;}

posts.text: æˆ‘å¾ˆå–œæ¬¢æ¨¡æ‹Ÿé¢˜ï¼ˆç¡®ä¿¡ ç”¨æ ˆæ¥å­˜è¯­å¥ï¼Œå‡ºç°æœ‰æ•ˆçš„å¾ªç¯åµŒå¥—å°±++æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œä¸ç»™å‡ºçš„æ¬¡æ•°åˆ¤æ–­ã€‚ ERRå‡ºç°çš„æ¡ä»¶æ˜¯ï¼šå¾ªç¯æ²¡æœ‰End || å˜é‡åé‡å¤ è¯´çš„å¾ˆç®€å•ï¼Œå†™èµ·æ¥å°±ä¸ä¸€å®šäº†ï¼ˆç¬‘ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849#include <bits/stdc++.h>using std::cin;using std::string;signed main() { int T; cin >> T; while (T--) { int L, O_giv = 0, stop = 0, O_max = 0, O_now = 0; string tmp; bool used[233] = {}, error = 0, looping[233] = {}; std::stack<int> s; cin >> L >> tmp; getline(cin, tmp); O_giv = tmp[2] == '1' ? 0 : isdigit(tmp[5]) ? (tmp[4] - '0') * 10 + tmp[5] - '0' : tmp[4] - '0'; for (int i = 1; i <= L; i++) { string opt; getline(cin, opt); if (error) continue; if (opt[0] == 'F') { if (used[opt[2]]) { error = 1; continue; } if (stop) { s.push(0); continue; } s.push(opt[2]); used[opt[2]] = 1; if (opt[opt.size() - 1] == 'n') { if (opt[4] != 'n') { O_max = std::max(O_max, ++O_now); looping[s.top()] = 1; } } else { if (opt[4] == 'n') stop = s.top(); else { int i = isdigit(opt[5]) ? (opt[4] - '0') * 10 + opt[5] - '0' : opt[4] - '0'; int j = isdigit(opt[opt.size() - 2]) ? (opt[opt.size() - 2] - '0') * 10 + opt[opt.size() - 1] - '0' : opt[opt.size() - 1] - '0'; if (i > j) stop = s.top(); } } } else { if (s.empty()) {error = 1; continue;} else if (!s.empty() && s.top() == stop) stop = 0; O_now -= looping[s.top()], looping[s.top()] = 0; used[s.top()] = 0; s.pop(); } } puts((error || !s.empty()) ? "ERR" : O_max == O_giv ? "Yes" : "No"); } return 0;}

posts.text: æ°´é¢˜ ä»¥å‰æ„Ÿè§‰ç‰¹åˆ«éš¾ï¼Œå…¶å®å°±æ˜¯è¿«çœŸå¤§%ä½  è´ªå¿ƒï¼š å‡ºç‰Œä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼šé¡ºå­ > å¸¦ç‰Œ > å¯¹å­ > å•ç‰Œ æ‰«å‡ºæ¥é¡ºå­ï¼Œæ‰«å‡ºæ¥å¸¦ç‰Œï¼Œå‰©ä¸‹çš„å°±æ˜¯å¯¹å­æˆ–å•ç‰Œï¼Œç›´æ¥åŠ ä¸Šå»ã€‚ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125126127128129130131132133134#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;int T, n, ans;int card[20];inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}void dfs(int dep) { if (dep >= ans) return; //---èµ°é¡ºå­--- //å•é¡ºå­ int k = 0; for (int i = 3; i <= 14; ++i) { if (!card[i]) { k = 0; continue; } if (++k >= 5) { for (int j = i; j >= i - k + 1; --j) --card[j]; dfs(dep + 1); for (int j = i; j >= i - k + 1; --j) ++card[j]; } } //åŒé¡ºå­ k = 0; for (int i = 3; i <= 14; ++i) { if (card[i] <= 1) { k = 0; continue; } if (++k >= 3) { for (int j = i; j >= i - k + 1; --j) card[j] -= 2; dfs(dep + 1); for (int j = i; j >= i - k + 1; --j) card[j] += 2; } } //ä¸‰é¡ºå­ k = 0; for (int i = 3; i <= 14; ++i) { if (card[i] <= 2) { k = 0; continue; } if (++k >= 2) { for (int j = i; j >= i - k + 1; --j) card[j] -= 3; dfs(dep + 1); for (int j = i; j >= i - k + 1; --j) card[j] += 3; } } //å¸¦ç‰Œ for (int i = 2; i <= 14; ++i) { //å¸¦ä¸èµ· if (card[i] <= 2) { continue; } card[i] -= 3; //ä¸‰å¸¦ä¸€ for (int j = 2; j <= 15; ++j) { if (j == i || !card[j]) continue; --card[j]; dfs(dep + 1); ++card[j]; } //ä¸‰å¸¦äºŒ for (int j = 2; j <= 15; ++j) { if (j == i || card[j] <= 1) continue; card[j] -= 2; dfs(dep + 1); card[j] += 2; } card[i] += 3; if (card[i] == 4) { card[i] -= 4; //å››å¸¦äºŒå•ç‰Œ for (int j = 2; j <= 15; ++j) { if (j == i || !card[j]) continue; --card[j]; for (int k = 2; k <= 15; ++k) { if (k == j || !card[k]) continue; --card[k]; dfs(dep + 1); ++card[k]; } ++card[j]; } //å››å¸¦äºŒå¯¹å­ for (int j = 2; j <= 14; ++j) { if (j == i || card[j] < 2) continue; card[j] -= 2; for (int k = 2; k <= 14; ++k) { if (k == j || card[k] < 2) continue; card[k] -= 2; dfs(dep + 1); card[k] += 2; } card[j] += 2; } //å››å¸¦äºŒç‹ if (card[15] == 2) { card[15] -= 2; dfs(dep + 1); card[15] += 2; } card[i] += 4; } } for (int i = 2; i <= 15; ++i) if (card[i]) ++dep; ans = std::min(ans, dep);}signed main() { T = read(), n = read(); while (T--) { memset(card, 0, sizeof card); ans = INF; for (int i = 1, a; i <= n; ++i) { a = read(), read(); if (a == 1) ++card[14]; else if (a == 0) ++card[15]; else ++card[a]; } dfs(0); printf("%d\n", ans); } return 0;}

posts.text:
Orz T1: queueè¦æ±‚å­—å…¸åºæœ€å°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŠŠäººæŒ‰èº«é«˜é™åºæ’åºï¼Œè¿™æ ·æ¯ä¸ªäººéƒ½å¯ä»¥è¢«æ”¾åœ¨åŒºé—´[b_i, i - b_i - 1]å†…ï¼ˆå·¦å³ç«¯ç‚¹ä¸ä¸€å®šæ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªé¡ºåºï¼‰ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆç›´æ¥insertåˆ°min(b_i, i - b_i - 1)å°±å®Œäº‹äº†ã€‚åˆ¤å®šimpossibleçš„æ¡ä»¶æ˜¯ç¬¬äºŒä¸ª<0äº†ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¹‹å‰å°±ä¸èƒ½æœ‰$b_i$ä¸ªäººäº†ã€‚ 12345678910111213141516171819202122#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n;std::pair<int, int> qwq[100005];std::vector<int> dkykimo;bool cmp (const std::pair<int, int> a, const std::pair<int, int> b) { return a.first > b.first;}signed main() { scanf("%d", &n); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) scanf("%d%d", &qwq[i].first, &qwq[i].second); std::sort(qwq + 1, qwq + 1 + n, cmp); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { int qaq = std::min(qwq[i].second, i - 1 - qwq[i].second); if (qaq < 0) return !printf("impossible"); dkykimo.insert(dkykimo.begin() + qaq, qwq[i].first); } for (auto i : dkykimo) printf("%d ", i); return !printf("
");} T2: primeçº¿æ€§ç­›é‡ŒæŠŠä¸¤ä¸ªè´¨å› å­çš„ç§¯è®°ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œå†å‰ç¼€å’Œã€‚ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 10000000;int Q, L, R, f[N+7], pri[N+7];bool vis[N+7];void init() { for (int i = 2; i <= N; ++i) { if (!vis[i]) pri[++pri[0]] = i, f[i] = 1; f[i] += f[i-1]; for (int j = 1; j <= pri[0] && i * pri[j] <= N; ++j) { if (!vis[i]) f[i*pri[j]] = 1; vis[i*pri[j]] = 1; if (i % pri[j] == 0) break; } }}signed main() { init(); scanf("%d", &Q); while (Q--) { scanf("%d%d", &L, &R); printf("%d
", f[R] - f[L-1]); } return 0;} T3: articlehashã€‚ æ²¡äº† æœ‰äº† å•hashåˆšåˆšå¯¹æ‹çš„æ—¶å€™æ’äº†ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚æ”¹æˆåŒhash 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425#include <bits/stdc++.h>typedef long long LL;const LL D1 = 1e9 + 7, D2 = 998244353, base1 = 131, base2 = 31;int n, m;LL hash1, hash2, b1[200005], b2[200005];char s[200005];std::set<std::pair<LL, LL>> qwq;signed main() { scanf("%d%d%s", &n, &m, s + 1); b1[0] = b2[0] = 1; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) b1[i] = b1[i-1] * base1 % D1, b2[i] = b2[i-1] * base2 % D2; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) hash1 = (hash1 * base1 % D1 + s[i] - 'a') % D1, hash2 = (hash2 * base2 % D2 + s[i] - 'a') % D2; qwq.insert(std::make_pair(hash1, hash2)); for (int i = m + 1; i <= n; ++i) { hash1 = ((hash1 - (s[i-m] - 'a') * b1[m-1] % D1 + D1) * base1 + s[i] - 'a') % D1; hash2 = ((hash2 - (s[i-m] - 'a') * b2[m-1] % D2 + D2) * base2 + s[i] - 'a') % D2; qwq.insert(std::make_pair(hash1, hash2)); } return !printf("%d
", (int) qwq.size());}

posts.title: Luogu P1070 [NOIP-pj 2009] é“è·¯æ¸¸æˆ
posts.text: qwq å¯ä»¥ç«‹åˆ»å†™å‡ºä¸€ä¸ª$O(N^3)$çš„æŸ¿å­ï¼š $f[i] = max(f[i-k] + sum[i][j] - sum[i-k][j-k] - cost[i-k]) = max(f[i-k] - sum[i-k][j-k] - cost[i-k]) + sum[i][j]$ å¥½åƒå¯ä»¥è¿‡äº†ï¼Œä½†ä¸ç‚å­¦qwq å¯ä»¥å‘ç°æ˜¯åœ¨å¯¹è§’çº¿ä¸Šè¿›è¡Œä¸€ä¸ªæ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£å¼çš„è½¬ç§»ï¼Œå¼€nä¸ªå•è°ƒé˜Ÿåˆ—ä¼˜åŒ–DPã€‚ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 1005;int n, m, p, f[N], sum[N][N], cost[N];std::deque<std::pair<int, int>> q[N];inline int upper(int x) { return (x % n + n) % n; }signed main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &p); for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= m; ++j) scanf("%d", &sum[i][j]); for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) scanf("%d", &cost[i]); for (int i = 2; i <= m; ++i) for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j) sum[j][i] += sum[upper(j - 1)][i-1]; for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) q[upper(i + 1)].push_back(std::make_pair(-cost[i], 0)); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) f[i] = -1145141919; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j) f[i] = std::max(f[i], q[upper(j - i + 1)].front().first + sum[upper(j - 1)][i]); for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j) { while (!q[upper(j - i + 1)].empty() && i - q[upper(j - i + 1)].front().second >= p) q[upper(j - i + 1)].pop_front(); int d = f[i] - sum[upper(j - 1)][i] - cost[j]; while (!q[upper(j - i + 1)].empty() && q[upper(j - i + 1)].back().first <= d) q[upper(j - i + 1)].pop_back(); q[upper(j - i + 1)].push_back(std::make_pair(d, i)); } } return !printf("%d\n", f[m]);}

posts.text:
è¿˜å¯ä»¥ T1: String Masterè¿™æ•°æ®èŒƒå›´ï¼Œç›´æ¥$O(N^3)$ç§’äº†ï¼Œ8è¯´äº† 123456789101112131415161718#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, limit, ans;char s[505], t[505];signed main() { scanf("%d%d%s%s", &n, &limit, s + 1, t + 1); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) { int change = 0; for (int k = 1; k <= std::min(n - i + 1, n - j + 1); ++k) { if (s[i+k-1] != t[j+k-1] && ++change > limit) break; ans = std::max(ans, k); } } } return !printf("%d
", ans);} T2:Tourist Attractionså¯¹äºa-b-c-dï¼Œè€ƒè™‘æšä¸¾b-cï¼Œæ€»æ•°å³ä¸ºï¼š$\sum (degree_b - 1)(degree_c - 1) - cir_{(b, c)}$.å…¶ä¸­$cir_{(b,c)}$è¡¨ç¤ºbcå½¢æˆä¸‰å…ƒç¯çš„ä¸ªæ•°ã€‚ è¿™ä¸ªæ•°æ®èŒƒå›´ä¸‰å…ƒç¯è®¡æ•°å¯ä»¥ç”¨bitsetç›´æ¥æã€‚$cir_{(b, c)} = b_b \& b_c.count()$. 123456789101112131415161718192021#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 1505;int n;long long ans, cnt[N];std::bitset<N> b[N];signed main() { scanf("%d", &n); for (int i = 1, x; i <= n; ++i) { for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) { scanf("%1d", &x); b[i][j] = x, cnt[i] += x; } } for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) if (b[i][j]) ans += (cnt[i] - 1) * (cnt[j] - 1) - (b[i] & b[j]).count(); return !printf("%lld
", ans);} T3: Walkå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªç‚¹iï¼Œå‘æ‰€æœ‰æƒå€¼ä¸º$val_i$å­é›†çš„ç‚¹è¿è¾¹ã€‚ ç›´æ¥å»ºä¼šæ­»ã€‚å¯ä»¥å¼€$2^20$ä¸ªè™šç‚¹ï¼Œè®©æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹å‘æƒå€¼å­é›†è¿è¾¹ã€‚ å»ºè¾¹åè¾¹å¥½åƒæœ‰ä¸¶å°å¤šï¼Œè¾¹ä¸ç”¨çœŸçš„å»ºå‡ºæ¥ï¼Œbfsæ±‚disã€‚ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int P = (1 << 20), Q = (P << 1) + 233;int n, m, acnt, bcnt, dis[Q], heada[Q], headb[Q];struct Edge { int to, nxt;} a[Q], b[Q];std::queue<int> q;inline void adda(int f, int to) { a[++acnt] = {to, heada[f]}, heada[f] = acnt;}inline void addb(int f, int to) { b[++bcnt] = {to, headb[f]}, headb[f] = bcnt;}inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}void rushB(int x, int d) { if (dis[x] >= 0) return; dis[x] = d; q.push(x); for (int i = headb[x], y = b[i].to; i; i = b[i].nxt, y = b[i].to) rushB(y, d); if (x > P) return; for (int i = 0; i < 20; ++i) if (x & (1 << i)) rushB(x ^ (1 << i), d);}signed main() { n = read(), m = read(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { int x = read(); adda(i + P, x), addb(x, i + P); } for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { int x = read(), y = read(); adda(x + P, y + P); } for (int i = 1; i <= n + P; ++i) dis[i] = -1; rushB(1 + P, 0); while (!q.empty()) { int x = q.front(); q.pop(); for (int i = heada[x], y = a[i].to; i; i = a[i].nxt, y = a[i].to) rushB(y, dis[x] + 1); } for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) printf("%d
", dis[i+P]); return 0;}

posts.title: Luogu P2831
posts.text: çŠ¶å‹DP ä¸¤åªçŒªç¡®å®šä¸€ä¸ªæŠ›ç‰©çº¿ã€‚é¦–å…ˆæ˜ç¡®ï¼šä½¿ç”¨æŠ›ç‰©çº¿è¿›è¡Œè½¬ç§»ã€‚ $f_{S|parabola_i} = min(f_{S|parabola_i}, f_S + 1)$. åªéœ€è¦é¢„å¤„ç†æŠ›ç‰©çº¿ã€‚ä¸¤åªçŒªå¯ä»¥ç¡®å®šä¸€ä¸ªæŠ›ç‰©çº¿ï¼Œå†æšä¸¾æ‰¾å‡ºåœ¨æŠ›ç‰©çº¿ä¸Šçš„çŒªçš„é›†åˆã€‚ ä¸¤ç‚¹ç¡®å®šæŠ›ç‰©çº¿å‚æ•°ï¼š $a = \frac{x_2y_1 - x_1y_2}{x_1x_2(x_1-x_2)}$ $b = \frac{x_1^2y_2 - x_2^2y_1}{x_1x_2(x_1 - x_2)}$. 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142#include <bits/stdc++.h>int T, n, m, parabola[23333], f[1 << 18];double x[20], y[20], a, b;inline void calc(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2){ a = (x2 * y1 - x1 * y2) / (x1 * x2 * (x1 - x2)); b = (x1 * x1 * y2 - x2 * x2 * y1) / (x1 * x2 * (x1 - x2));}inline bool onParabola(double a, double b, double x, double y) { return fabs(a * x * x + b * x - y) <= 0.000001;}signed main() { scanf("%d", &T); while (T--) { memset(f, 0x3f, sizeof f); parabola[0] = 0; scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) scanf("%lf%lf", x + i, y + i); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { parabola[++parabola[0]] = (1 << (i - 1)); for (int j = i + 1, vis = 0; j <= n; ++j) { if (vis & (1 << (j - 1))) continue; calc(x[i], y[i], x[j], y[j]); if (a >= 0) continue; parabola[++parabola[0]] = (1 << (i - 1)); for (int k = j; k <= n; ++k) if (onParabola(a, b, x[k], y[k])) vis |= (1 << (k - 1)), parabola[parabola[0]] |= (1 << (k - 1)); } } f[0] = 0; for (int i = 0; i <= (1 << n) - 1; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= parabola[0]; ++j) f[i|parabola[j]] = std::min(f[i|parabola[j]], f[i] + 1); printf("%d\n", f[(1<<n)-1]); } return 0;}

posts.title: hzoi-CSP-44
posts.text:
è·ªäº† T1: Då®¹æ˜“æƒ³åˆ°ï¼Œå›ºå®šç«¯ç‚¹rå‘å·¦ç§»åŠ¨lï¼Œ[l, r]çš„gcdä¸€å®šæ˜¯å•è°ƒé€’å‡çš„ï¼Œè€Œä¸”å€¼å¾ˆå°‘ã€‚æ¯ä¸ªgcdéƒ½å¯ä»¥è¦†ç›–ä¸€æ®µåŒºé—´ã€‚ ç»´æŠ¤ä¸€ä¸ªå•è°ƒæ•°ç»„ï¼Œå­˜æ¯ä¸ªgcdå¯¹åº”çš„å·¦ç«¯ç‚¹ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±å¯ä»¥å‘é¦™æ¸¯è®°è€…ä¸€æ ·è·‘çš„å¾ˆå¿«ã€‚ æ¯æ¬¡ä¸€è¾¹æ›´æ–°ç­”æ¡ˆä¸€è¾¹æ›´æ–°æ•°ç»„ã€‚ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, a[100005];long long ans = -1;std::pair<int, int> qwq[100005];int gcd(int x, int y) { return y == 0 ? x : gcd(y, x % y);}signed main() { scanf("%d", &n); for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%d", &a[i]); for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) { ans = std::max(ans, (long long) a[i]); qwq[i] = std::make_pair(i, a[i]); for (int g = a[i], j = i - 1, k = i; j; j = qwq[j].first - 1) { g = gcd(g, a[j]); ans = std::max(ans, (long long) (i - qwq[j].first + 1) * g); if (g == qwq[k].second) qwq[k].first = qwq[j].first; else k = j; qwq[j].second = g; } } return !printf("%lld
", ans);} T2: Eåˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤ç§æƒ…å†µï¼šæœ€å¤§å€¼å’Œæœ€å°å€¼åœ¨ä¸åŒé¢œè‰²å’Œç›¸åŒé¢œè‰²ã€‚ åªå†™äº†ç¬¬ä¸€ç§ï¼Œæ ·ä¾‹éƒ½è¿‡ä¸å»ï¼Œå±…ç„¶è¿‡äº†ï¼Œï¼Œï¼Œ åº”è¯¥æœ‰ä¸ªå®Œæ•´ç‰ˆï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘é¸½äº†ã€‚ 1234567891011121314#include <bits/stdc++.h>int mx = -1, mn = 0x3f3f3f3f, a = 0x3f3f3f3f, b = -1, x[100005], y[100005];signed main() { scanf("%d", &n); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", &x[i], &y[i]); if (x[i] > y[i]) std::swap(x[i], y[i]); mx = std::max(y[i], mx), mn = std::min(mn, x[i]); a = std::min(x[i], a), b = std::max(y[i], b); } return !printf("%lld
", (long long) abs(mx - a) * (long long) abs(mn - b));} T3: Fä¸¤ä¸ªç«¯ç‚¹å…¶ä¸­æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå¿…ç„¶æ˜¯ä¸Šæ¬¡çš„ç«¯ç‚¹ã€‚é’¦å®šä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œè®¾f[i][j]ä¸ºè¿›è¡Œäº†iæ¬¡æ“ä½œï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªç«¯ç‚¹åœ¨jã€‚ æœ‰ä¸¤ç§è½¬ç§»ï¼Œä¸€ç§æ˜¯ä»jè½¬ç§»åˆ°ç°åœ¨çš„ç«¯ç‚¹$p_i$ï¼Œä¸€ç§æ˜¯ç”±ä¸Šæ¬¡çš„ç«¯ç‚¹è½¬ç§»åˆ°ç°åœ¨çš„ç«¯ç‚¹ã€‚ $f[i][p_i] \leftarrow \min (f[i-1][k] + dis(k, p_i))$ $f[i][j] \leftarrow f[i-1][j] + dis(p_i, p_{i-1})$ çœ‹åˆ°åŒºé—´æ‰¾minï¼Œå¯ä»¥çº¿æ®µæ ‘ä¼˜åŒ–. 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081#include <bits/stdc++.h>typedef long long ll;const int N = 1000005;const ll INF = 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;int n, q, a, b, p[N];struct SegTree { int l, r; ll min1, min2, tag;} t[N << 2];void build(int p, int l, int r) { t[p].l = l, t[p].r = r, t[p].min1 = t[p].min2 = INF, t[p].tag = 0; if (l == r) return; int mid = (l + r) >> 1; build(p << 1, l, mid), build(p << 1 | 1, mid + 1, r);}void pushdown(int p) { if (!t[p].tag) return; t[p<<1].tag += t[p].tag, t[p<<1|1].tag += t[p].tag; t[p<<1].min1 += t[p].tag, t[p<<1|1].min1 += t[p].tag; t[p<<1].min2 += t[p].tag, t[p<<1|1].min2 += t[p].tag; t[p].tag = 0;}void change(int p, int x, ll o) { if (t[p].l == t[p].r) { t[p].min1 = std::min(t[p].min1, o - t[p].l); t[p].min2 = std::min(t[p].min2, o + t[p].l); return; } int mid = (t[p].l + t[p].r) >> 1; pushdown(p); if (x <= mid) change(p << 1, x, o); else change(p << 1 | 1, x, o); t[p].min1 = std::min(t[p<<1].min1, t[p<<1|1].min1); t[p].min2 = std::min(t[p<<1].min2, t[p<<1|1].min2);}ll query1(int p, int l, int r) { if (t[p].l >= l && t[p].r <= r) return t[p].min1; int mid = (t[p].l + t[p].r) >> 1; ll ret = INF; pushdown(p); if (l <= mid) ret = std::min(ret, query1(p << 1, l, r)); if (r > mid) ret = std::min(ret, query1(p << 1 | 1, l, r)); return ret;}ll query2(int p, int l, int r) { if (t[p].l >= l && t[p].r <= r) return t[p].min2; int mid = (t[p].l + t[p].r) >> 1; ll ret = INF; pushdown(p); if (l <= mid) ret = std::min(ret, query2(p << 1, l, r)); if (r > mid) ret = std::min(ret, query2(p << 1 | 1, l, r)); return ret;}ll query(int p) { if (t[p].l == t[p].r) return (t[p].min2 - t[p].l); pushdown(p); return std::min(query(p << 1), query(p << 1 | 1));}signed main() { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &n, &q, &a, &b); for (int i = 1; i <= q; ++i) scanf("%d", p + i); build(1, 1, n); p[0] = a; change(1, b, 0); for (int i = 1; i <= q; ++i) { ll qwq = std::min(query1(1, 1, p[i]) + p[i], query2(1, p[i], n) - p[i]); t[1].tag += abs(p[i] - p[i-1]); t[1].min1 += abs(p[i] - p[i-1]); t[1].min2 += abs(p[i] - p[i-1]); change(1, p[i-1], qwq); } printf("%lld
", query(1)); return 0;}

posts.title: sdfzoi-0914
posts.text:
å¼± Gekoo å¼± T1: è´­ç‰©Luogu P3045 ç‰›åˆ¸ å¯å›é€€çš„è´ªå¿ƒ å¼€ä¸‰ä¸ªå † heap_p, heap_q, g2r. åˆ†åˆ«å­˜p[i], q[i], p[i] - q[i]. g2rç”¨æ¥åæ‚”ï¼Œé€‰äº†ä»£è¡¨æ’¤é”€ä¹‹å‰çš„ä¸€ä¸ªé€‰æ‹©. å¥—è·¯Orz 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, k, ans; long long m;int p[50005], q[50005];bool trash[50005];struct Node { int cash, id; friend bool operator <(Node a, Node b) { return a.cash > b.cash; }};std::priority_queue<Node> heap_p, heap_q;std::priority_queue<int, std::vector<int>, std::greater<int> > g2r;signed main() { scanf("%d%d%lld", &n, &k, &m); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", &p[i], &q[i]); heap_p.push((Node) {p[i], i}), heap_q.push((Node) {q[i], i}); } for (int i = 1; i <= k; ++i) g2r.push(0); while (m > 0 && ans < n) { while (trash[heap_p.top().id]) heap_p.pop(); while (trash[heap_q.top().id]) heap_q.pop(); if (heap_q.top().cash + g2r.top() < heap_p.top().cash) { Node x = heap_q.top(); m -= x.cash + g2r.top(), g2r.pop(); if (m < 0) break; g2r.push(p[x.id] - q[x.id]); trash[x.id] = true, heap_q.pop(); } else { Node x = heap_p.top(); m -= x.cash; if (m < 0) break; trash[x.id] = true, heap_p.pop(); } ++ans; } return !printf("%d
", ans);} T2: æ‹†ç½‘çº¿è´ªå¿ƒã€‚ é€‰å››ä¸ªæœ‰ä¸¤ç§é€‰æ³•ï¼šé€‰åŒä¸€ä¸ªå­æ ‘æˆ–è€…é€‰ä¸¤ä¸ªç‚¹å¯¹ã€‚ å‰è€…è¦3æ¡è¾¹ï¼Œåè€…åªè¦2æ¡ã€‚ æ‰€ä»¥ç‚¹å¯¹é€‰çš„è¶Šå¤šè¶Šä¼˜ã€‚ æŠŠæ ‘ä¸Šæ‰€æœ‰èƒ½é€‰çš„ç‚¹å¯¹éƒ½é€‰äº†ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¿˜æœ‰å‰©çš„å°±ç›´æ¥åŠ ä¸Šã€‚ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 100005;int T, n, k, ecnt, ans;int head[N], qaq[N];bool vis[N];struct Edge { int to, nxt; } e[N << 1];inline void addEdge(int f, int to) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f]}, head[f] = ecnt;}inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}void dfs(int x, int fa) { for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) if (y != fa) dfs(y, x); qaq[++qaq[0]] = x;}signed main() { T = read(); while (T--) { memset(head, 0, sizeof(head)); memset(vis, 0, sizeof(vis)); qaq[0] = ecnt = ans = 0; n = read(), k = read(); for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) { int x = read(); addEdge(i, x), addEdge(x, i); } dfs(1, 0); for (int i = 1; i <= qaq[0] && k > 1; i++) { int x = qaq[i]; if (vis[x]) continue; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y != x && !vis[y]) { vis[x] = vis[y] = 1; ++ans, k -= 2; break; } } } printf("%d
", ans + k); } return 0;} T3: å¯†å®¤å®åè°´è´£pdfæŠŠæ•°æ®èŒƒå›´å†™æ¼äº† æ˜¾ç„¶å¯ä»¥çŠ¶å‹é’¥åŒ™ ç›´æ¥è·‘è¾¹ä¸º1çš„spfaï¼Œå¯ä»¥è½¬ç§»çš„æ¡ä»¶è¿˜æœ‰$(key_{now}\ \& \ key_{edge}) == key_{edge}$. 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, m, k, ecnt, ans = 0x3f3f3f3f;int exist[5005], head[5005], dis[5005][1030];struct Portal { int to, nxt, key;} p[10005];inline void link(int f, int to, int key) { p[++ecnt] = {to, head[f], key}, head[f] = ecnt;}inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}void spfa() { memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof(dis)); std::queue<std::pair<int, int> > q; q.push(std::make_pair(1, exist[1])); dis[1][exist[1]] = 0; while (!q.empty()) { int x = q.front().first, key = q.front().second; q.pop(); for (int i = head[x], y = p[i].to; i; i = p[i].nxt, y = p[i].to) { if ((key & p[i].key) == p[i].key && dis[y][exist[y]|key] > dis[x][key] + 1) { dis[y][exist[y]|key] = dis[x][key] + 1; if (y == n) ans = std::min(ans, dis[y][exist[y]|key]); q.push(std::make_pair(y, exist[y] | key)); } } }}signed main() { n = read(), m = read(), k = read(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j) exist[i] |= read() << j; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { int x = read(), y = read(), key = 0; for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j) key |= read() << j; link(x, y, key); } spfa(); if (ans == 0x3f3f3f3f) puts("No Solution"); else printf("%d
", ans); return 0;}

-1 : 0; if (a == 0) return (c == 0 || (c % b == 0 && c / b > 0)) ? -1 : 0; if (b == 0) return (c == 0 || (c % a == 0 && c / a > 0)) ? -1 : 0; if (c < 0) a = -a, b = - b, c = -c; if (a < 0) a = -a, opa = 1; if (b < 0) b = -b, opb = 1; ll x, y; ll g = Exgcd(a, b, x, y); if (c % g != 0) return 0; ll t = c / g; x *= t, y *= t, a /= g, b /= g, c = t; if (opa) a = -a, x = -x; if (opb) b = -b, y = -y; if (a < 0) a = -a, b = -b, c = -c; if (a * b < 0) return -1; x %= b; while (x <= 0) x += b; y = (c - a * x) / b; if (y < 0) return 0; ll y_min = y % a; while (y_min <= 0) y_min += a; return y_min <= y ? (y - y_min) / a + 1 : 0;}signed main() { int T; scanf("%d", &T); while (T--) { ll a, b, c; scanf("%lld%lld%lld", &a, &b, &c); ll ans = Solve(a, b, c); if (ans == -1 || ans > 65535) puts("ZenMeZheMeDuo"); else printf("%lld

ç„¶åè¯»é”™æ•°æ®èŒƒå›´ï¼Œä»¥ä¸º60%çš„æ•°æ®æ¨¡æ•°ä¸ºè´¨æ•°ï¼Œå¼€å§‹ç‹‚å†™è´¨å› æ•°åˆ†è§£æ±‚ç»„åˆæ•°ï¼Œç ç ç ç ç ã€‚ç»“æœä¸çŸ¥é“å’‹å›äº‹è°ƒä¸å‡ºæ¥ï¼ŒGGã€‚T3ä¹Ÿæ²¡æ—¶é—´å†™äº†ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚éšä¾¿å†™äº†ä¸€ä¸‹æš´åŠ›ï¼Œç»“æœç€æ€¥å†™é”™äº†ï¼Œæœ¬æ¬¡è€ƒè¯•å‡‰å‡‰ã€‚ m)å¥‡å¶æ€§ä¸åŒæ—¶æ— è§£ç„¶è€Œæ•°æ®å¹¶æ²¡æœ‰æ— è§£çš„æƒ…å†µ è¦ä¸å†è¯ä¸€ä¸‹CRTæ•°å­¦è‹¦æ‰‹ä»Šå¤©å¥½æƒ¨ CRTç”¨æ¥æ±‚è§£ä¸€ç»„ç”±å½¢å¦‚$x_i \equiv a_i \mod m_i$ç»„æˆçš„çº¿æ€§åŒä½™æ–¹ç¨‹ç»„ã€‚
